ESP.ORIGINAL: Expunged Radio Report: #410
ESP.TRADUIT: 已删除的广播报告：410号

ESP.ORIGINAL:
[Date]: 2067
[Com Channels]: [X]: "Evil Storm" {Source: Wangliang 71} [Y]: "Motherland" {Source: Beijing}
[X]: Evil Storm to Motherland, are you hearing us?
[Y]: Motherland to Evil Storm, communication is passing through. You are two weeks ahead of schedule, Evil Storm. Is there an urgent request?
[X]: Comrade Kang has expressed a desire to be granted access to a conversion kit for his personal Warcloak, to upgrade it from the old Hei Guei patterns to the proper Dragoon抯 pattern. Nellis is under tight surveillance from us, so the required Stealth field generator and other circuitry parts could be safely dropped at Point Kassarelia 15.
[Y]: Request denied. With all that turmoil happening in Alaska, we cannot afford to send any conversion kit that far from the frontline. Tell Director Kang to focus on his new duties as Wangliang's commanding officer and to complete Project Vanguard according to schedule.
[X]: Alright, we will pass the information over. What about the delivery of weapons you mentioned last month?
[Y]: The cargo plane is being prepared as we speak. We can抰 send out any heavy weaponries this time, though.
[X]: Any chance we might get some Gauss Rifles?
[Y]: We will try our best. Motherland out
\\end of communication//
ESP.TRADUIT:
[日期]：2067年
[通讯频道]： [X]："邪风" {来源：魍魉71号基地} [Y]："祖国" {来源：北京}
[X]：邪风呼叫祖国，能否接收？
[Y]：祖国回复邪风，通讯畅通。你们比预定时间提前了两周联系，是否有紧急情况？
[X]：康同志申请为其个人战甲配备改装套件，希望将黑鬼旧式升级为正式龙骑制式。目前内利斯基地处于我方严密监控下，建议将所需隐形力场发生器及其他电路部件空投至卡萨列利亚15号坐标点。
[Y]：申请驳回。阿拉斯加战局动荡，前线无法抽调改装套件。转告康主任专注履行魍魉基地指挥官新职，按期完成"先锋计划"。
[X]：明白，将如实传达。另关于上月提及的武器交付事项——
[Y]：运输机已在准备中。但本次无法提供重型武器。
[X]：高斯步枪是否有调配可能？
[Y]：尽力安排。祖国完毕
\\通讯终止//

ESP.ORIGINAL: Expunged Radio Report: #487
ESP.TRADUIT: 已删除的广播报告：487号

ESP.ORIGINAL:
[Date]: 2072
[Com Channels]: [X]: "Evil Storm" {Source: Wangliang 71} [Y]: "Motherland" {Source: Beijing} [Z]: "Mountain Rat" {Source: Ontario}
[X]: Evil Storm to Mountain Rat, we are hearing you loud and clear!
[Z]: What about the blueprints of Project Vanguard? Motherland is awaiting results.
[X]: The third batch of trash cans is operational. Was the conversion file we sent you last month corrupted?
[Z]: Negative, but we haven't been able to replicate anything good from your shared design plans. The circuitry busts as soon as we start routine checkups, and our replicated units all detonate when given multi class classification choices.
[X]: Copy that, we will investigate the issue. Did you tried powering them up with the native operating software?
[Z]: The leaked General Atomic processor? But it's a downgrade compared to our own variant!
[X]: It's more reliable. We also had troubles making the bots native processor compatible with your UNet Convolution Neural Network. Motherland's algorithms are great to run microchips, but shit when used in robotics circuits.
[Z]: Roger that. We will try with that method as soon as we can. By the way, how did you manage to implement that self-repairing feature? I don抰 think that was presented in the conversion file.
[X]: It抯 still a work in progress. We deciphered the basics of it from the General Atomics design document our 揵enefactor?provided. Seems like stolen Robco抯 tech if you ask me.
[Z]: Capitalist pigs... Those corpos will do everything to get that government paycheck, even if it means ripping off other corpos ideas!
[X]: For sure. Still, we will send you the full schematics once we polish things a bit more. Don抰 worry.
[Z]: Alright, Mountain Rat's out.
\\end of communication//
ESP.TRADUIT:
[日期]：2072年
[通讯频道]： [X]："邪风" {来源：魍魉71号基地} [Y]："祖国" {来源：北京} [Z]："山鼠" {来源：安大略省}
[X]：邪风呼叫山鼠，信号接收清晰！
[Z]："先锋计划"蓝图进展如何？祖国在等待结果。
[X]：第三批"垃圾桶"已投入运行。上月发送的改装文件是否损坏？
[Z]：文件完好，但根据你们的设计图复制的单位全部失败，常规检测就会烧毁电路，赋予多级分类指令时直接自爆。
[X]：收到，我们将核查问题。是否尝试过使用原生操作系统驱动？
[Z]：你是说泄露的通用原子处理器？但那性能比我们的版本还差！
[X]：但更稳定。你们的UNet卷积神经网络根本无法兼容机器人原生处理器，祖国的算法在芯片上表现优异，但用在机械电路里就是坨屎。
[Z]：明白了。我们会尽快测试。话说你们怎么实现的自修复功能？改装文件里可没提这个。
[X]：仍在调试阶段。是从某位"赞助人"提供的通用原子设计文档里破译的，要我说根本就是偷罗科公司的技术。
[Z]：资本主义猪猡...这些企业为了政府合同连同行都照抄不误！
[X]：确实。等我们完善后会发送完整图纸，放心。
[Z]：收到，山鼠下线。
\\通讯终止//

ESP.ORIGINAL: Expunged Radio Report: #555
ESP.TRADUIT: 已删除的广播报告：555号

ESP.ORIGINAL:
[Date]: 2077
[Com Channel]: [X]: "Evil Storm" {Source: Wangliang 71} [Y]: "Motherland" {Source: Beijing} [W]: "Shadow Cat" {Source: Texas}
[X]: Fu... Fucking hell. Is anyone even hearing us????
[Y]: (static sounds)
[X]: (slamming sounds). FUCK!
[W]: Shadow Cat to Evil Storm, is someone out here?
[X]: We... We receive your transmission! Shadow Cat, do you copy?
[W]: Not for long. Listening Outpost is collapsing, Level -5 is flooded, and radiation has already breached Level -2. It抯 over for us, I fear.
[X]: I抦... I抦 sorry Comrade.
[W]: Don抰 be. Motherland unloaded quite a few nukes on Austin. Too close to the epicenter of the local bombardment, we were lucky to have survive that long.
[X]: There isn抰 a 揗otherland?anymore. All of that? It抯 all over.
[W]: Perhaps. A shame it had to end this way.
[X]: You... you ever felt regrets?
[W]: Regrets for what? 揃etraying?our country? I didn抰. None of us joined the Columns because we liked the Chinese all that much. We joined because whatever took over our government deported our sisters, defunded the universities our kids would attend, gave our rights to whatever corporation offered the most, and cracked the Unions that were supposed to protect us.
[X]: Still, I feel... shame? We just traded one evil overlord for another. Was Motherland any better?
[W]: It wasn抰. But we were the Columns, not the Chinese lapdogs, no matter how history will label us.
[X]: We SPIED on our brothers and sisters! We LIED to our own families about our 搄ob? We gave away intelligence to a foreign power, and worked hand to hand with them to take over OUR land! We even crafted them weapons to kill our own brothers!
[W]: And yet, we acted FOR our country. Who warned the Boulder抯 civilians about the real deadliest symptoms of the Blue Flu? Who sheltered loyal and patriotic journalists hunted down by the State? Us. Only we stepped up when our government broke all our rights and customs!
[X]: I can抰... make peace with myself. The only good thing Wangliang ever did was sharing to the public whatever grim experiments Poseidon was doing at Omicron, and even that, it was to sabotage an Army抯 Program. The rest? Lies, schemes and...
[W]: And yet, it saved lives. My Brother was at Nellis you know, freshly arrived Private. You all saved him from participating in these twisted live tests.
[X]: I... Really? You think that...
[W]: (static sounds)
[X]: Shadow Cat?
\\end of communication//
ESP.TRADUIT:
[日期]：2077年
[通讯频道]： [X]："邪风" {信号源：网凉71} [Y]："祖国" {信号源：北京} [W]："影猫" {信号源：德克萨斯}
[X]：操...操他妈的！有人能听见吗？？？
[Y]：（静电杂音）
[X]：（砸击声）妈的！
[W]：影猫呼叫邪风，还有人活着吗？
[X]：我们...收到了你的信号！影猫，请确认？
[W]：撑不久了。监听站正在坍塌，-5层已被淹没，辐射都渗到-2层了。我们到头了。
[X]：对...对不起，同志。
[W]：不必。祖国往奥斯汀砸的核弹可不含糊。离轰炸中心这么近，能活到现在已是奇迹。
[X]：早没他妈"祖国"了。全完了...一切都...
[W]：或许吧。可惜结局竟是这样。
[X]：你...有过后悔吗？
[W]：后悔什么？"背叛"国家？得了吧。我们加入柱石组织又不是因为多爱中国佬。是那个篡权的政府先流放我们的姐妹，抽空孩子的教育经费，把公民权卖给价高的企业，还镇压本该保护我们的工会！
[X]：可我还是...觉得羞耻？我们不过是从一个暴君换到另一个暴君。祖国又强到哪去？
[W]：确实不怎么样。但我们是柱石，不是中国的走狗，无论历史怎么编排。
[X]：我们监视同胞！对家人谎报"工作"！向外国泄露情报，联手侵占自己的土地！甚至帮他们造武器屠杀兄弟！
[W]：但我们为真正的祖国而战！是谁向博尔德市民揭露蓝瘟疫最致命的症状？是谁庇护被政府追杀的爱国记者？是我们！当权者践踏法律时，只有我们站了出来！
[X]：我...无法原谅自己。魍魉唯一的好事就是曝光海神在奥米克戎的反人类实验，而那还是为了破坏军方项目。其他呢？全是阴谋诡计...
[W]：但这些阴谋救了我弟弟。他刚被派往内利斯基地当新兵，是你们让他躲过了活体实验。
[X]：真...真的吗？你觉得...
[W]：（通讯中断）
[X]：影猫？
\\通讯终止//

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need to Write
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要写下来

ESP.ORIGINAL:
3am.
Right now? Wangliang is asleep. Or at the very least, what REMAINS of Wangliang.
Tears are flowing through my face.
We all cope in different ways. For Wally, it抯 hoarding and hiding food under his bed, and then pretend he has no idea where the supplies went. For Mathis, it抯 lashing in anger at whatever electronics malfunction in front of him.
Me? I cry, and I write. That抯 about it.
Cannot believe all of this is happening. How did it come to this? Only 6 of us remains now.
I never believed Terence when he told me the issue was THAT serious. We should have all gone down there to box them, instead of letting half of us get slaughtered like cattle.
Mathis blew up the entrance to Level -4 when they didn抰 return. Terence抯 request, yeah. What a great idea...
The entrance got sealed, but the galleries leading to the larger dorms, mess hall, and armory collapsed seconds afterward. The dorms won抰 be missed, but that抯 a whole lot of living space that disappeared because he badly calibrated the explosive charges.
His "highness" Director Kang? No signs of him. I抦 sure he locked himself up before doing that little stunt of his. Let抯 see how long he last without external supplies.
He always hated us. He抯 the one to blame!
ESP.TRADUIT:
凌晨三点
现在？魍魉睡着了。或者说，至少是魍魉"剩下的部分"。
泪水正从我脸上滚落。
我们各有各的应对方式。沃利会把食物囤积在床底，再假装对物资去向一无所知；马西斯会对任何故障的电子设备暴怒发泄。
而我？我只是哭，然后写下来。仅此而已。
难以置信这一切正在发生。怎么会走到这一步？现在只剩我们六个人了。
当初特伦斯说事态严重时我还不信。我们本该一起下去解决它们，而不是让一半人像牲口般被屠杀。
马西斯在他们没回来后炸掉了-4层入口。是啊，按特伦斯的"英明指示"...多妙的主意啊...
入口是封住了，但通往大寝室、食堂和军械库的通道几秒后就塌了。寝室没了倒无所谓，可那么多生存空间就因为他装药量计算失误全毁了。
至于我们"尊贵的"康主任？鬼影都没见着。我打赌他在搞那出戏码前就把自己锁进安全屋了。倒要看看没有外部补给他能撑多久。
他从来都恨我们。这一切都该怪他！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Past the Point of No Return
ESP.TRADUIT: 回不了头了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Shit...
Checked-up Will while he was busy sleeping, juiced to the bone on the old vodka he stole from the reserve. My fear is confirmed.
He抯 turning, like me.
There抯 no mistake, the small dots and burns on his arms have started to crackle, and his flesh is starting to itch him like hell.
It抯 the radiation. That抯 for sure. Knew that blowing up the access to the factory would cause problems down the lines.
If I tell him, he抯 probably going to lash at everyone. Blame them for making us two sleep at Level -1 while the rest 搑emain safe?at Level -2.
It抯 no use. If only he knew that it didn抰 matter.
Mathis and Wally are turning too. Jerry Scot, I can抰 say, but Maxwell is also starting to display some of the early symptoms.
This place will be our grave, I swear...
ESP.TRADUIT:
操蛋...
趁威尔偷喝储备库老伏特加醉死过去时，我检查了他。最担心的事还是发生了——
他也在变异，和我一样。
错不了：那些手臂上的红点和灼痕开始皲裂，皮肉痒得让他抓狂。
是辐射。 早该想到炸毁工厂通道会埋下这种祸根。
要是告诉他，这疯子准会撕了所有人，指责大家让我们俩睡在-1层，而其他人都"安全地"躲在-2层。
但没意义了。 他根本不明白，在哪层都一样。
马西斯和沃利也在变异。杰瑞·斯科特暂时没事，可麦克斯韦尔已经出现早期症状...
我发誓，这鬼地方迟早变成我们的集体坟场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terence's Diary #01
ESP.TRADUIT: 特伦斯的日记 #01

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Diary,
This morning was decidedly a low point for me. I'm not sure how to cope with the news
Lily's letter managed to reach me despite the State抯 unrelenting surveillance. Don抰 know how she knew I was hiding in the Sewers.
Dad apparently disowned me. Drew a straight line over my name, and removed all mentions of me in the family抯 will.
"For him, it's like you never existed at all"
"Can't have a damn traitorous commie as a son. The reds took my boy and never gave him back"
I wish I could speak to him. Tell him what I know. That I never betrayed our people, that all I'm doing is FOR us, the little guys and gals of America!
It's pointless.
He would never understand that the real enemy isn't the People's Republic... it's our own corrupt fascist and capitalist government.
ESP.TRADUIT:
日记：
今天早晨无疑是我人生的低谷。面对这样的消息，我不知该如何自处。
莉莉的信居然能突破政府无孔不入的监控网送到我手里。真不知道她怎么发现我藏在排水系统的。
父亲公开与我断绝关系了。他在族谱上划掉了我的名字，遗嘱里也抹去关于我的所有痕迹。
"对他而言，你就像从未存在过"
"老子不能有个该死的叛共分子当儿子。赤匪带走我的孩子，再没把他还回来"
我多希望能亲口告诉他真相，我从未背叛同胞，所做的一切恰恰是为了我们，为了美国每一个被践踏的普通人！
但毫无意义。
他永远不会明白，真正的敌人不是人民共和国...而是我们腐败的法西斯资本政府。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terence's Diary #02
ESP.TRADUIT: 特伦斯的日记 #02

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Diary,
I have finally accepted the offer of Max抯 older brother, Lucian Smithing: I'm joining the Columnists!
Lucian and another guy spent a whole month with me in a secret safehouse near the Colorado. Taught me some basics about firearms use and manutention, Revolutionary ideals, explosives handling, and some basic survival skills.
Seems like they liked my profile!
They told me it's now time for me to formally join the new cell they are part of in "Wangliang 71". If things go smoothly, they will bring me there (blindfolded of course) in a couple of days.
I'm sealing my fate here, I know, but where else can I go?
ESP.TRADUIT:
日记：
亲爱的日记，我终于接受了马克斯他哥哥卢西安·史密斯的提议：我要加入“纵队”了！
卢西安和另一个家伙在科罗拉多附近的一个秘密安全屋里和我待了整整一个月，教会了我一些基础枪械使用和维护、革命理念、爆炸物处理，还有基本的生存技能。看
来他们挺中意我的背景！
他们告诉我现在是时候正式加入他们在“魍魉71号”的新小组了。如果一切顺利，几天后他们就会把我带过去（当然得蒙上眼睛）。
我知道这是在亲手决定自己的命运，可除此之外，我还能去哪儿呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terence's Diary #03
ESP.TRADUIT: 特伦斯的日记 #03

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Diary,
Wangliang is surely not what I expected!
I must admit, I was really apprehensive about what my brand-new world there would be. Was portraying some kind of underground gigantic radio station, filled to the brim with Chinese spies and infiltrators, all really to gulp me with a single bite.
Turns out, the base is fully manned by fellow Americans! All 15 of us Columnists are apparently purebred Midwest and Southwest folks. Some are clueless youngsters like me, while others, like Lucian, have spent some time studying and fighting in China and the Middle East before joining the cell.
The only non-American of the facility is the base抯 Director, Mr. Kang. From what the others told me, he is a decorated soldier, and was formerly part of the 揅rimson Dragoons?(China抯 top notch special forces!) but got stranded here and was thus reassigned as director of Wangliang.
Kang seems a bit of a recluse and doesn抰 interact with us all that much, but at least all the others are super warm with me and make me feel I抦 finally part of something!
ESP.TRADUIT:
日记：
魍魉基地完全出乎我的意料！
说实话，来之前我满脑子都是可怕的想象，以为这里会是某个地下巨型电台，塞满了中国间谍和渗透者，随时准备把我生吞活剥。
结果发现，基地里全是美国同胞！我们"纵队"15个成员清一色来自中西部和西南部。有些是像我这样懵懂的年轻人，还有些像卢西安那样的老手，他们在加入前曾在中国和中东参与过行动。
整个基地唯一的非美国人是康主任。听队友说，他曾是功勋军人，来自中国顶尖特种部队"赤龙突击队"，因故滞留此地才被调来管理魍魉基地。
康主任性格孤僻，很少和我们接触，但其他队员都特别热情，让我第一次有了归属感！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terence's Diary #04
ESP.TRADUIT: 特伦斯的日记 #04

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Diary,
I'm slowly but surely accommodating to the life in Wangliang. Oh, sure we don't get much sunlight, but there are some perks in our bunker!
First and foremost, we recently got access to two Model 207 Terminals, and guess what? They both are linked to Wangliang抯 network, and come with an inbuilt jukebox and a full library for us to enjoy!
One of them was set up in the small living room at Level -2, while the other was placed in Director抯 Kang room, for his personal use. Kang however told us he would gladly let use his computer if we do it while he is working in his personal space.
Secondly, a small portion of Level -4 flooded last winter. Marty said he will repair it, but for now, the bunker has a small pond where Will and I regularly go fishing. We even caught basses and a turtle last week!
Now that I抦 part of the crew, Lucian and Ethania have asked for me to join them down below, to work on that 揚roject Vanguard?thingy. Sadly, Kang and Isaac both disagreed, and so I抦 due to instead join Maria, Jerry Scot, and Maxwell at the Listening Outpost.
Seems like I抦 now Wangliang's (fourth-in-command) radio operator!
ESP.TRADUIT:
日记：
我正逐渐适应魍魉基地的生活。虽然这里难见天日，但地下堡垒也有意外之喜！
最令人振奋的是，我们最近配发了两台207型终端机，你猜怎么着？它们都接入了魍魉内部网络，内置点唱机和完整数字图书馆！一台被安置在-2层休息室，另一台则放在康主任的私人房间。不过康主任特意交代，只要不打扰他工作，我们随时可以使用他那台。
去年冬天-4层局部渗水形成的积水区，原本该由马蒂负责修缮，如今却成了我和威尔的秘密渔场。上周我们甚至钓到了鲈鱼和乌龟！
作为正式成员，卢西安和埃萨尼亚曾想调我去参与"先锋计划"，但康主任和艾萨克一致反对。最终我被分配至监听站，与玛丽亚、杰瑞·斯科特和麦克斯韦尔共事。
没想到，我竟成了魍魉基地的第四顺位通讯官！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terence's Diary #05
ESP.TRADUIT: 特伦斯的日记 #05

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Diary,
Today was an... interesting day.
Since Mathis and all the armory抯 folks left Wangliang to go back to their family for the weekend, and no transmissions with Motherland were incoming today, Lucian kindly asked me to replace them to perform the 揚asam conversion?
Long story short, but one of our neighboring Listening Outpost in America, 揝hadow Cat? recently got in contact with a Communist cell based in Brazil, who then shared us their method to convert all our near useless Shanxi Pistols into their 揚asam specification? It抯 a simple refitment to turn them into a sort of light SMG, and it抯 neither costly nor very hard to perform!
THEN... Kang and Ethania asked Sam to assist me in the task.
I knew Ethania suspected that I had a crush on Sam since she joined us last year, but to think Kang would be complicit? Clap clap Director!
A date in the armory, chitchatting while polishing guns and adjusting barrels... I got to say, that抯 Wangliang 71 for you!
The more I interact with Sam, the more I抦 convinced I will fall for her. She抯 just... so kind, so positive. Her soul has something special, I don抰 know if I can even put words on that.
Her smile...
Lily would have loved her for sure. But again, Lily died in that car accident a couple of months ago. With her gone, I don抰 have any family anymore.
Sam isn抰 a grizzly cynic like Lucian, nor an indoctrinated fanatic like Ethania or Isaac. Neither is she willingly clueless like me about what we are really doing here.
I should be more like her, I think?
Hell nah! I just want to be with her!
ESP.TRADUIT:
日记：
今天真是…耐人寻味的一天。
由于马蒂斯和军械库全员都回老家度周末，加上今天没有祖国方面的通讯，卢西安居然让我临时顶班参与“帕萨姆改装计划”简单来说，我们的美国友邻站点“影猫”联系上了巴西的共产主义小组，对方分享了将山西手枪改装成“帕萨姆”轻型冲锋枪的技术！成本低廉到连我这种生手都能操作。
接着…康主任和埃萨尼亚竟指派萨姆来协助我。
埃萨尼亚早看出我暗恋萨姆（自从她去年加入起），但连康主任都默契配合？给您鼓掌啊长官！
在军械库的“约会”：边打磨枪管边闲聊…这就是魍魉71号的浪漫吧？
越是相处，我越确信自己会沦陷。她那种温柔又坚定的气质…莉莉肯定会喜欢她。可惜莉莉已在两个月前的车祸中离去，如今我彻底没有亲人了。
萨姆不像卢西安那样愤世嫉俗，也不像埃萨尼亚或艾萨克被意识形态裹挟，更不像我对组织行动浑浑噩噩。或许我该学她的通透？
才怪！我只想和她在一起！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terence's Diary #06
ESP.TRADUIT: 特伦斯的日记 #06

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Diary,
Today, Kang invited me to his room to discuss. Interesting time, really.
I think me, like the rest of us here, really misjudge him. We often joke that Kang is a cold recluse and an antisocial individual that refuse to mingle because he hates us all.
We抮e wrong.
He is just lonely... and severely depressed.
It抯 Wangliang he hates, and himself. Not us.
Kang told me about his days in the Chinese抯 Special Operation Division. The former group under his command, the 揝i Xiong? which then turned into the 揥u Xiong?when his rival Nao Zheng took command of it.
The light in his eyes... He misses them. Even that Zheng he can stop himself from badmouthing.
Kang also showed me his personal officer sword, and his own Warcloak Armor. Even let me use the sword for a couple of swings!
I told him about Sam and Lily. About my deadbeat dad that went to Union抯 rallies only to beat poor workers up. Told him about my miserable life before Wangliang. Also told him that Sam was expecting!
I see it now. For me, Wangliang was my salvation.
For him? A punishment.
I wish we could talk some more, Mr. Jiale Kang.
ESP.TRADUIT:
日记：
今天康主任邀我去他房间谈话。真是段耐人寻味的时光。
我意识到——包括我在内的所有人，都彻底错看了他。我们总嘲笑康是个厌恶交际的冷血隐士，认定他的孤僻源于对众人的憎恶。
我们错了。
他只是孤独…且深陷抑郁。
他恨的是魍魉这座牢笼，是困在此地的自己，而非我们。
康向我谈起在中国特种作战司的岁月，他曾执掌的“肆雄”分队，宿敌郑挠接手后将其改组为“武雄”。
说起这些时他眼中闪烁的光…他怀念那些。连提及郑挠都克制了恶言。
他向我展示了将校佩刀和战甲，甚至允许我挥了几下那把军刀！
我也向他袒露了一切：萨姆和莉莉的事，那个只会参加工会集会殴打劳工的混账父亲，来魍魉前的糜烂人生，还有萨姆怀孕的消息！
此刻我终于明白：魍魉于我是救赎，
于他却是刑罚。
康佳乐先生…真希望能再与您畅谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terence's Diary #07
ESP.TRADUIT: 特伦斯的日记 #07

ESP.ORIGINAL:
My God...
It's really happening, isn't it?
Once I felt the ground shake and the entire bunker structure shackle like a mad joyride, I knew it couldn't be anything else... The bombs. The Nukes.
The World on fire.
Sure, Motherland had cut communication with us earlier this morning, but... I was expecting anything, NOT that.
We finally caved in and struck first... or what is Motherland?
It's of no importance. Wangliang shouldn抰 still stand, and yet it is, and the radiation levels outside prove the Mojave is likely by now a pile of irradiated ruins. Was likely only the first salvo if we managed to survive.
We have electricity, water and food for a couple of years... but after that?
Lily, wake me up from this nightmare!
ESP.TRADUIT:
老天爷啊…
这一切真的发生了，对吧？
当整个地堡像疯狂过山车般震颤时，我就知道不可能是别的——核弹，那些该死的核弹。
世界正在燃烧。
祖国今早切断了与我们的通讯，但我怎么都没想到会是这样…
究竟是我们先发动了攻击？还是祖国遭到了袭击？
不重要了。魍魉基地本不该还存在，可它偏偏屹立不倒，而莫哈韦沙漠的辐射读数证明外面早已沦为废土。如果我们能撑过去，这恐怕还只是第一轮打击。
我们有够用几年的电力、水源和食物…然后呢？
莉莉，快把我从这场噩梦中摇醒！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terence's Diary #08
ESP.TRADUIT: 特伦斯的日记 #08

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Fucking hell...
Even after the end of the world we can't catch a break, eh?
It all started this morning, when Lucian went to the assembly line to recaliber some of the Vanguardists and spray a fresh coat of paint on the newer ones.
Half an hour later, heard some screams. Rushed there with Ethania and God forbid, the bots were there, over Lucian's dead body, crawly all around like spiders.
Ethania tried to reach Lucian and turn off the power console, but the Vanguardists then jumped and mauled her in front of me.
None of us can explain why the bots have suddenly turned hostile. It's been 5 years since we have the little shits running and never have they displayed that kind of behavior.
Kang? He has locked himself in his room and is irresponsive since the bots became crazy. I refuse to think he has a hand in that, but...
This is not good. We are more numerous than them, but they are aggressive as ever. If we use firearms, we only increase the risk of one of them getting the brilliant idea to self-detonate, and Wangliang will be doomed.
Thanks God, their shit sensors have kept them idling in the assembling room, but it is only a matter of time before they start exploring the corridor and then reach the living sections.
I'm taking some guys with whatever electrifying equipment we have to barricade the Factory. If we can isolate and lock the bots in the Assembling room, we might have a chance after all...
Sam insists to come with us. I told her it抯 dangerous and irresponsible considering she is 3-months pregnant, but she refuses to back down.
I抦 afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT:
他妈的…
世界都毁灭了还不让人喘口气是吧？
今早卢西安去装配线给"先锋"机器人做校准，顺便给新批次喷漆。半小时后突然传来惨叫——我和埃萨尼亚冲过去时，那些该死的机器正像蜘蛛般在他尸体上爬行！埃萨尼亚想去关电源，结果被两台"先锋者"当场撕碎…
没人能解释它们为何突然发狂。这些机器人平稳运行了五年，从没出现过这种异常。康主任？从机器人暴走就把自己反锁在房里毫无反应。我不愿怀疑他，但…
情况糟透了。我们人数占优，可它们凶残至极。开枪又怕哪个天才机器人突然自爆，那整个魍魉就完了。万幸它们的破烂传感器暂时把它们困在装配间，但天知道它们什么时候会闯进生活区…
我正带人用电击设备封锁工厂区。只要能把它们锁死在装配间，或许还有救…
萨姆坚持要跟来。她怀孕三个月了，这太危险也太不负责任——可她根本不听劝。
…我怕了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terence's Diary #09
ESP.TRADUIT: 特伦斯的日记 #09

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'm... dying am I not?
What kind of question is that...
One of the Vanguardists got me from behind and caved two of its legs in my back. Been bleeding out and can't even feel my lower body.
We managed to repel the bots and 搒top?their advance. Isaac found a way to temporarily lock the door of the assembling plant to keep them inside.
No use. They still found a way to open them and we had to set up a barricade behind the stairs
Great. They still got Maria, Isaac, Lory, Marty and everyone I brought down there. All dead.
Dear God, even my Sam wasn抰 spared by those trash demons. Our little Timmy will never be born. It抯 all my fault.
What else is there for me to live for? Lucky me, I will soon join both of them.
I heard the detonation upstairs. Mathis blew up the entrance to the Factory, as I requested him to do if we didn抰 return past noon. At least the damn Vanguardists won抰 escape from here now...
(Blood mark) explosion has destabilized something in the bunker system. Radiation is flooding inside, and quickly.
At this rate...
ESP.TRADUIT:
我…快死了吧？
这问题真蠢…
一台"先锋"从背后偷袭，两条机械腿直接捅穿了我的后背。血流不止，下半身已经完全没知觉了。我们勉强击退了这批机器人，艾萨克想办法暂时锁死了装配车间的门。
没用的。它们还是找到了破解方法，我们只能在楼梯口临时筑起路障。
哈…玛丽亚、艾萨克、萝莉、马蒂，还有所有跟我下去的人全死了。连我的萨姆都没逃过那些钢铁恶魔的毒手。我们的小蒂米…永远没机会出生了。都怪我。
我还有什么理由活下去？幸运的是，我很快就能去陪他们了。
楼上传来爆炸声——马蒂斯按我的要求炸毁了工厂入口（说好如果我们中午没回来就动手）。至少那些该死的机器人逃不出去了…
（血迹）爆炸似乎破坏了地堡的防护系统。辐射值正在急速上升…
照这个速度…

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come to me, my dear. It's time we have that face to face conversation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到我这儿来，亲爱的。是时候面对面谈谈了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you are! Hope you won't get lost inside Omicron, we have much to discuss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里！希望你不会在奥密克戎里迷路，我们有很多事情要讨论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Compromised Sentry Bot [05020617] (mod) NPC : Compromised Protectron [05020616] (mod) NPC : Mister Heavenly [05020618] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_GREETING_000261BB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be shy. I'm waiting for you in the research section of the bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别害羞。我在地堡的研究区等你。

ESP.TRADUIT: 帮自己一把，别打偷车的主意。虽然诱人，但不值得被8.5毫米子弹打得像奶酪一样满是窟窿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm exhausted. Driving the truck all the way up to Sausalito killed my drive...
ESP.TRADUIT: 累瘫了...一路飙开到索萨利托快杀了我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Shenlong Guard [05015685] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00015A85_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cowboy hat, Hei Guei Armor? My, my, seems like we caught the attention of "Stealthtatenza"! Looking for Shi tech, Sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 牛仔帽和黑鬼装甲？哎呀呀，看来我们引起“隐身者”的注意！这位先生是想淘点始族科技？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Shenlong Guard [05015684] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00015A84_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're interested in some Black Shenlong products, run to Madam Ling. She's the boss when it comes to sales.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果您对黑神龙的产品感兴趣，就去找凌女士。要买卖，她是老板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Shenlong Guard [05015684] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00015A83_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking for Madam Ling? Inside the Terminal, OSI section. Be courteous and caps up front, and we will sell you some shiny toys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 找凌女士吗？科学办公室终端里面。礼貌点，把瓶盖亮出来，我们会卖给你一些闪亮的玩具！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Shenlong Guard [05015684] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00015A82_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hum? Oh it's you, "customer". What exactly can I do for you now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈？哦，是你啊，“顾客”。我现在能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_GREETING_00012A8B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Madam Ling. Don't let yourself be fooled by my current contract with the OSI, my shop is still open for decent mercs with enough caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是凌女士。别被我跟科学办公室的临时合同唬住，店铺照开，只要佣兵够硬、瓶盖够响！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_GREETING_00012A92_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We of the Black Shenlong have the best toys of the entire black market, from here to New Reno... for a price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们黑神龙拥有整个黑市上最好的玩具，从这儿到新里诺……只要出价够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_GREETING_00012A92_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hum, you again? What can I do for you, Mr. "Stealthtenza"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼，又是你？我能为您效劳吗？“隐身者”大人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_GREETING_0001368F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... YOU!!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…是你！！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00012290_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You FINALLY come back to me, ready to suffer my revenge!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你 终 于 回到了我身边，让我能复仇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00012290_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... LOOK AT WHAT YOU HAVE DONE TO ME!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看……看看你对我做了什么！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00012290_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fit is a bit too... local, I would say? Well, best not to flash the Guanyin to the entire Mojave, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这身未免太…土了吧？要我说，最好别把观音在莫哈维全境显摆，懂么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_0001228F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never thought a Hei Guei could be worn that elegantly! Love the poncho!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没想过黑鬼能穿的这么优雅！爱你的披风！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_0001228E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! So you found a way to wear that beauty? I'm amazed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！所以你想办法把那美人穿上了？惊到我了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_0001228D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You? What a lucky gal I am!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你？我可真是个幸运女孩！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gin Corbett [0500404A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\GinVoiceType\Stealthten_GREETING_000102A7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Syndicate greets you, "Stealthtenza". We have a message to convey to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 组织向您问好，“隐身者”。我们有话捎给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0500D278] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_0000D27B_1.wav
NPC : Messenger [0500D278] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well well... Look who came here after all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好，好……看看到底是谁来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00009469_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems like my little birds have earned their caps this time. Wasn't sure you would take the bait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我的小小鸟这次挣得了足够的瓶盖。我还不确定你会不会回来咬勾呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00009469_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you have survived my little stunt with the Securitrons. Not a surprise considering what you did to all my associates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你从我的安保小把戏里挺过来了？倒也不意外——毕竟你收拾我那些手下的手段够利落。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00009469_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But none of that matter now. Here you are, my dear... Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在这些都不重要了。你来了，亲爱的……邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00009469_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madam Ling is inside. I will smoke you if you do anything displeasing her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凌女士在里面。你要是让她不悦，我就把你干掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Shenlong Guard [0500707E] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00008087_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madam Ling is inside. DON'T try anything funny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凌女士在里面。别耍小心思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Shenlong Guard [0500707E] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00008086_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Searching for Madam Ling? She is inside with OSI's idiots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找凌女士吗？她和科学办公室的蠢货们在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Shenlong Guard [05013E86] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00014281_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gauss Rifle? Nah, that thing is one of our Leishens, pure Black Shenlong's product.
ESP.TRADUIT: 高斯步枪？不，那是我们雷神系列里的，纯黑神龙的产品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Shenlong Guard [05013E86] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00014280_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that suit on you? You will make me good publicity, "customer".
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿着那套装甲呢？你会为我做个好宣传的，“客户”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_GREETING_00008085_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes? Huh, let's see, what do we have here today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？嗯，让我看看，都有什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_GREETING_00008069_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not any kind of boring NCR representative I take it. No, far too dirty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想应该不是什么无聊的NCR代表吧。不，太脏了不像。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_GREETING_00008069_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're a potential customer, just go check the bodyguards outside and don't bother me with questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是客户，就去外面的保镖那里看看，别问问题来烦我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_GREETING_00008069_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have been told to refrain from selling our stock to non-NCR entities, but once the Junfas give me the go, the Black Shenlong will open its market.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被告知不要卖我们的股票给非ncr实体，但一旦军阀同意，黑神龙就会开放市场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_GREETING_00008069_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes? Don't waste my time please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？请别浪费我时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_GREETING_00008083_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best of luck to you! Hope you will find a way to repair it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运！希望你能找到修理它的方法！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_0000707A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hum? Oh! What can the Followers do for you, friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？哦！追随者能帮上你什么，朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00007066_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hum?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00007079_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, don't overabuse this technology. It is neither a toy, neither a trinket to show off. I trust you with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请不要过度滥用这项技术。它既不是玩具，也不是用来炫耀的小玩意儿。在这方面我相信你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00007063_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you have collected everything we need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我们需要的东西都找齐了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00007059_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hum? Oh, you're the outsider the Elder welcomed with open arms!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？哦，你就是长老敞开双臂欢迎的外来者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00007049_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The other scribes are a bit... skeptical, but I only heard good things about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他的文士还有点…怀疑你，但我这只听到了夸你的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00007049_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我说说，我能帮你什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00007049_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00007057_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please don't... don't abuse of my trust... All my friends... all dead...
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你别……别辜负我的信任。我所有的朋友…都死了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00007042_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nooo... It... It can't be. They're... they're all...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不……不……不要啊。全都……全都…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_GREETING_00005C45_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus had days like this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶稣当年也这么倒霉过！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_Attack_00012A96_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let抯 go get OUR Stealth Suit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就拿回来 属 于 我 们 的潜行装甲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_Attack_00012A95_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well, well. The great Stealthtenza! Back on duty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好，好。伟大的隐身者！又有活儿了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_Attack_00012A94_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't kill me. I'm immortal!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀不掉我的，我永生不灭！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_Attack_00012A93_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Euhaaa, I'm turning you to ashes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呜啊，我要把你烧成灰！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lord of Turrets [05004445] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LordofTurretsVoiceType\Stealthten_Attack_00010AA3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was about time I could finally fight you, "Stealthtenza"!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我终于可以和你战斗了，“隐身者”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lord of Turrets [05004445] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LordofTurretsVoiceType\Stealthten_Attack_00010AA2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no match for the Lord of Turrets!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你根本不是炮塔之主的对手！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lord of Turrets [05004445] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LordofTurretsVoiceType\Stealthten_Attack_00010AA1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wrongdoer! Begone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 罪人！退散！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brigham Young [05004043] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\BrighamVoiceType\Stealthten_Attack_000106A1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Monster! Calamity of the desert!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怪物！沙漠灾劫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brigham Young [05004043] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\BrighamVoiceType\Stealthten_Attack_000106A3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not worthy of what you claimed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 言行不一！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brigham Young [05004043] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\BrighamVoiceType\Stealthten_Attack_000106A4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: RAAAAAAAA!!!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊 啊 啊 啊 啊 啊 ！！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Skull [05004048] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\RedSkullVoiceType\Stealthten_Attack_0001129F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Glare will burn that DAMNED suit to ASHES!!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 红光会把那 该 死 的装甲烧成 灰 ！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Skull [05004048] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\RedSkullVoiceType\Stealthten_Attack_000112A0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, that radioactive booze isn't enough to keep me in one piece...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啧，这破辐射酒可粘不上老子的身子……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Skull [05004048] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\RedSkullVoiceType\Stealthten_Attack_000112A6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn you Seraphim, I'm FALLING APART!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的炽天使，我在分 崩 离 析 ！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Skull [05004048] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\RedSkullVoiceType\Stealthten_Attack_000112A7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm broken... but YOU'RE GOING TO END UP WORSE!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我残了…但 你 会 更 惨 ！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Skull [05004048] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\RedSkullVoiceType\Stealthten_Attack_000112A1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Urg... As long as my head stands... the Lord will bring me back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 额啊……留的头还在…上帝必让我归来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brigham Young [05004043] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\BrighamVoiceType\Stealthten_Hit_0001A21D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My body is HIS temple... as long a my head bow to HIM!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的身体是祂的圣殿...只要我的头颅仍向祂俯首！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brigham Young [05004043] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\BrighamVoiceType\Stealthten_Hit_0001A21E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lord... give me faith!
ESP.TRADUIT: 主啊…施我以援手！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brigham Young [05004043] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\BrighamVoiceType\Stealthten_Hit_000106A6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No pain will quell me! I CANNOT die!
ESP.TRADUIT: 痛苦不会使我屈服！我不会死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brigham Young [05004043] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\BrighamVoiceType\Stealthten_Hit_000106A7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide... I need... to go back...
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷…我要…回去……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Red Skull [05004048] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\RedSkullVoiceType\Stealthten_Hit_000112A4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Chinese broadcast)
ESP.TRADUIT: （中文广播）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corpse [05018A39] (mod) Quest : ([05018A36]stealthtenzaquestradio) Mysterious Chinese Broadcast EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\KangVoice\stealthten_RadioHello_00018A38_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Integrity breached: Invisibility Available]
ESP.TRADUIT: [完整性被破坏：可隐身]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_steathtenzavoic_000010B0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Critical Situation: Stealth Mode granted]
ESP.TRADUIT: [紧急情况：允许隐身模式]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_steathtenzavoic_00001390_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Dragoon injured: Stealth field provided. Retreat to regroup]
ESP.TRADUIT: [龙骑士受伤：提供隐形场。撤退重整]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_steathtenzavoic_00001391_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Mission Compromised: ensure retrieval of Limit-115 before escape]
ESP.TRADUIT: [任务妥协：逃跑前务必取回限制-115]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_steathtenzavoic_00001392_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Wounds threshold reached: Stealth cape recommended]
ESP.TRADUIT: [伤害达到阈值：推荐隐形斗篷]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_steathtenzavoic_00001393_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Directive 58 online: cloaking field ready to be deployed]
ESP.TRADUIT: [在线执行58号指令：隐身场准备就绪]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_steathtenzavoic_00001394_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Comrade failing: Camouflage X8 granted]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败了同志：迷彩X8授予]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_steathtenzavoic_00001395_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [GUANYIN Interface: Online]
ESP.TRADUIT: [观音系统：在线]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_steathtenzaente_00001951_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [GUANYIN Interface: Powering-up]
ESP.TRADUIT: [观音系统：开机]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_steathtenzaente_00001952_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [GUANYIN Interface active: Hello, Dragoon]
ESP.TRADUIT: [观音界面激活：你好，龙骑士]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_steathtenzaente_00001953_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Capitalist pig detected: Attack! Attack!]
ESP.TRADUIT: [发现资本主义猪：攻击！攻击!］
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_stealthtenzadet_00002D6C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Hostile American identified: Engage the target!]
ESP.TRADUIT: [敌对美国人已识别：攻击目标！］
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_stealthtenzadet_00002D6D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [People's Republic of China threatened: Respond with full force!]
ESP.TRADUIT: [中华人民共和国威胁：全力反击！］
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_stealthtenzadet_00002D6E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Mission endangered: Quell the enemy!]
ESP.TRADUIT: [危险人物：镇压敌人！］
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_stealthtenzadet_00002D6F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They... They were waiting for us! And as soon as we step foot on dry land, they had us encircled...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们……他们在等我们！我们一上岸，他们就把我们包围了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy1_0000643F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now... everyone... everyone is...
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后……大家…大家都……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy1_0000643F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What carnage... What the hell happened here?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 尸横遍野……这儿到底发生了什么？！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm... I'm... My, my name is Lindy. I'm in the field of Pre-War tech's rediscovery and reselling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我…我是，我的名字是林迪。我是干发掘并转售战前技术这行的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy11_00006441_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea... yeah... I know what you are thinking... I'm... a... a prospector.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是……是…我知道你在想什么……我…是个……寻宝者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy11_00006441_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We... we all... are.. were... Me and the... gang... call... called ourselves the Scrap Divers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们……全都…都是…曾经是……我和……团伙……称…称呼自己废品搜潜者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy11_00006441_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down, I'm not trying to hurt you. What is your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静，我没有伤害你的打算。你叫什么名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I... I... I have no idea... The...there were only six of them... We had the numbers but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我…我…我不知道………他们...只有六个人……我们人多，但是……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy12_00006443_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They... they were all armed to the teeth. Even High-tech Military grade gear for... for some of them...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们……他们都全副武装。他们中的一些…甚至装备了高科技军事装备……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy12_00006443_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a... bloodbath... Oh god... the gang... everyone is... dead now...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是场……大屠杀……哦…上帝……团伙里…的大家……现在都死了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy12_00006443_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: "They"? Who exactly attacked you?
ESP.TRADUIT: “他们”？到底是谁袭击了你们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... it can't be... You... You aren't one of them are you? Please... please don't kill me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 别…不要……你……你不是他们中的一员吧？求你了……求你不要杀我……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy13_00006445_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... No, don't... don't kill me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…不,不要……别杀我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy13_00006445_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead, or so it seems. Now only you remain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了，看来是的。只剩下你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ye...Yeah. We use... used to explore the Colorado's riverbank... or... or even Lake Mead, sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是…是的。我们常……常常探索科罗拉多的河岸…或……有时或者是米德湖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy111_00006447_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's rarely a lot of... of stuff to find down there... but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那儿水下很少有丰厚的……物品要找……但是…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy111_00006447_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But since we are... were the only ones to do the diving, we... got to find some rare stuff sometimes...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但因为我们…我们是唯一去搜潜的，我们…有时候必须找到一些稀有的东西……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy111_00006447_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Scrap Divers? Got a nice ring to it. You scavenge stuff in watery places?
ESP.TRADUIT: 废品搜潜者？听着不错。你在水下搜寻东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What... what treasure?! I knew Robb bragging about our... our discovery in that Boulder City's saloon was...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么……什么宝藏？！我知道罗柏到处炫耀……在巨石城酒馆瞎嚷嚷我们的发现…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy112_00006449_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Half of the Mojave heard... heard about that story... If only he had kept his mouth shut! They would... they would have never come for us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 半个莫哈维…都知道了……要是他当时闭上嘴巴就好了！他们……他们就不会来找我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy112_00006449_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robb, Miss Cousteau, Wet Skin... all the others. Everyone would still be alive right now...
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗柏、库斯托女士、湿皮……还有其他人。就都还活着……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy112_00006449_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Scrap Divers? Heard you guys dug out a treasure from the river's bank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废品搜潜者？听说你们在河岸挖出了宝藏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hum... No. No, they didn't look like NCR soldiers or... or Rangers, they... They didn't even share uniforms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…不。不，他们看起来不像NCR士兵或者…游骑兵，他们…甚至不穿一种服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy121_0000644D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Miss Cousteau used to... to be in the NCR infantry. She would have known if they were!
ESP.TRADUIT: 库斯托女士过去是……NCR步兵的一员。是的话，她会知道的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy121_0000644D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Armed to the teeth? Could it be NCR's deserters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 全副武装？会是NCR的逃兵吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The... the tin can men? No... No, didnt... didn't seemed like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: …铁皮人？否。不…不……看起来不像。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy122_0000644E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of them... none used Power Armor. And I know what I'm talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们……没人用动力装甲。我知道我说的什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy122_0000644E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and Wet Skin once found a T-51b in Lake Mead, would have... recognized it if the attackers had some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和湿皮曾经在米德湖发现过一具T-51b，我们会…如果袭击者有我们会认出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy122_0000644E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: High-tech Military-grade stuff? Was the Brotherhood of Steel involved?
ESP.TRADUIT: 高科技军事级别的东西？钢铁兄弟会参与了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... Not much. I... I was on the other side of the river but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…不多。我…我当时在河的另一边，但是……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy123_0000644F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There... there was a man with a weird hat, some sort of Cowboy? And next to him... some kind of huntress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里……有个男人戴着一顶奇怪的帽子，像是某种牛仔？在他旁边的是……某种女猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy123_0000644F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of them looked... looked like a strange ghoul. Another had weird... weird glowing goggles...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的一个……看起来像个奇怪的食尸鬼。另一个戴着……奇怪的发光护目镜……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy123_0000644F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then there was their leader. Tall blonde with... with an eyepatch and a... And a big gun too...
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后是他们的头儿。高个金发……戴着眼罩…还有一把大枪……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy123_0000644F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He... he was the one that killed Miss Cousteau...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他……就是他杀了库斯托女士…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy123_0000644F_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you remember anything specific about the individual attackers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还记得袭击者的特征吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... NO! YOU MONSTERS! I'M NOT GOING DOWN WITHOUT A FIGHT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…不！你这怪物！我不会不战而降的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy131_0000703F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] Indeed. Seems like we missed someone here!
ESP.TRADUIT: [撒谎] 当然是。我们好像漏了一个！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bypassing them? Sadly not, I'm almost certain of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绕过他们的方法？遗憾的是没有，我几乎可以肯定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle3_0000706A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: "U.S. Covert Operations Manual" detailed these suits often came with biometric readers, to render the suit unusable outside of registered users.
ESP.TRADUIT: 《美国机密行动手册》详细介绍了这些装甲通常配有生物识别读取器，使装甲无法在未注册情况下使用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle3_0000706A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure how exactly those readers work, but the springlocks won't release unless you possess the genetic match of the registered user.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不确定这些读取器是如何工作的，但除非你拥有与注册者相匹配的基因，否则识别不会通过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle3_0000706A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could try frying the springlocks with a high output voltage, then manually removing them, but... I wouldn't recommend it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以尝试用高输出电压轰炸识别锁，然后手动移除它们，但是…我不推荐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle3_0000706A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really, I can't help you with that, sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾，这个我帮不了你，抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle3_0000706A_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The internals are locked by sort of springlocks, you think you could help me in...
ESP.TRADUIT: 它的内部是被识别锁锁住的，你能帮我……

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I was on the other side of... of the river when it happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我当时在河的另一边…当一切发生的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy14_0000703D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I saw Miss Cousteau drawing her... her pistol toward them, I... I wanted to cr...cross the river to help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我看到库斯托女士拉开……手枪指着他们的时候，我……我想……过河来帮忙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy14_0000703D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then they killed her and... and lined up all the others and they...
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后他们杀了她……让其他人站成一排，然后他们……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy14_0000703D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They gunned them all down like... like dogs! Oh god no...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们把他们都打死了，就像…像路边野狗一样！哦，天哪，不……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy14_0000703D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I swam here when they left. Hoped anyone had... had survived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们走的时候我游到这儿来了。希望有人……活了下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy14_0000703D_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a minute... How is it that only you survived?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等下……为什么只有你活了下来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: N...Not caps. No... nor even a Pre-war money stash. NOT EVEN GOLD!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…没有瓶盖... 甚至连战前的钱都没有。更没有金子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy15_0000703E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It all started three... three days ago... A small scavenging expedition North of the... the, the river.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切始于…三天前……这条河北部我们的一次小探险…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy15_0000703E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We found this "suit" at the bottom of the water, on the mud floor, some... some kind of armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在河底找到了这套“衣服”，在泥层上，某种……某种装甲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy15_0000703E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't Power Armor, so me and Wet Skin decided to... to dive and lift it up...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是动力装甲，所以我和湿皮决定…潜入水中，把它带出来……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy15_0000703E_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... but we got surrounded by Lakelurks and the boat capsized...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…我们被湖沼蟹包围了，船也翻了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy15_0000703E_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we brought the news to Miss Cousteau and, and described it to her, she... she, she told it was "a real treasure".
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们把这个消息告诉库斯托女士，并向她描述时，她……她说这是“真正的宝藏”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy15_0000703E_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We... we were planning to bring the big boat and the... the whole... everyone to retrieve it but then... Robb talked too much...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们…本打算开大船，带上…带上所有人手去捞…可罗布说太多了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy15_0000703E_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This treasu... "discovery" you found. What exactly was it to attract that kind of attention?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这宝…“东西”你所发现的。到底哪点吸引了如此多注意？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yo... you think you could take down the lurkers by... by yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你……你觉得你可以一个人搞定…湖沼蟹？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy16_00007041_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No you... you're going to double cross me or... or... But I have nothing else to loose...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不你…你不会耍我吧但…但我也没有什么可失去的了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy16_00007041_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, I see you have a... a, a Pip Boy. I... I'm going to give you... the... the coordinates of the... the armor location...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这儿，我看到你有个…哔哔小子。我…我给你……装甲…的位置…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy16_00007041_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't... don't take advantage of... of my trust...
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你别……别辜负……我的信任……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lindy [05005C2A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LindyVoice\Stealthten_topiclindy16_00007041_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could retrieve it for you... IF we split the reward for its sale. I would just need the location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以帮你找回来……如果我们能把卖它的酬金分了。告诉我位置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Pre-War camouflage armor? Biometric readers? Hold on, let me see first what we are talking about, so I can understand your request.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战前迷彩装甲？生物识别读取器？等等，先让我弄清楚具体情况，才好理解你的需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen1_0000704B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a found a Pre-War camouflage armor, but I need help to bypass its biometrics readers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一件战前迷彩装甲，但我需要帮助绕过它的生物识别读取器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Steel be damned... That's the thing you found? Never seen stuff like that, but... I think I know what that may be!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我嘞个钢铁…这就是你找到的东西？从来没见过这种，但……我想我知道这是什么！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen2_00007050_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's an old relic from before the nukes, a military-grade Stealth Armor with an internal cloaking device.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是核武器前的遗物，军用级别的迷彩装甲，内置隐形装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen2_00007050_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, like a sort of super light jumpsuit, but with an built-in infinite Stealth Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，就像一件超轻的连身衣，但内置了一个可无限复用的隐形小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen2_00007050_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, those things weren't created by the US Army of old. Foreign tech from the opposing side of the conflict, the "People's Republic of China".
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，这些东西并不是由美国军队发明的。而是出自冲突的对立国——“中华人民共和国”的科技。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen2_00007050_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, finding one here means whoever used the suit was likely on a secret spying or sabotage mission, hence the biometric readers in case of capture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里能找到意味着穿这身衣服的人很可能在执行秘密间谍或破坏任务，所以才有了生物识别读取器防止被捕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen2_00007050_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Show the Stealth Armor)
ESP.TRADUIT: （展示隐形装甲）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, bring it here then. Need to see what you're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，拿过来吧。我得看看你说的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen2_00007051_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... don't have it with me at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它…暂时不在我身上

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to use the suit I see. Well, the Elder seems to confide in you enough to trust you with the bunker's most delicate matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看你想用上这套装甲。长老看起来也敢把地堡里大大小小的事情托付给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen3_00007052_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not everyone might like that, but you're nearly one of us now. I will assist you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然还没到所有人都认可的地步，但你现在几乎是我们的人了。我会帮你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen3_00007052_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This being said, you're asking me to tamper with technology no one in the Brotherhood is really familiar with. That's a first problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 话虽如此，但你是要我篡改整个兄弟会里没人真正精通的技术。这是头个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen3_00007052_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would need to first develop a knack for Chinese tech. For that, I'm going to need help, I'm no Elijah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得先掌握中国技术的诀窍才行。这事儿我需要帮忙——毕竟我又不是以利亚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen3_00007052_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you think you could recaliber the biometrics readers so they recognize me as a user?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你能不能重新调整一下生物识别读取器让它们认出我是用户？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I knew how... sharing Brotherhood secrets with outsiders is the lowliest form of treason. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我知道怎么做……但与外人透露兄弟会的秘密也是最卑劣的弃誓。对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen3_00007058_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would love helping you, even only to gain all that juicy and mysterious data but... If only the Elder could vouch for you to join us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使只是为了获得那些有趣而神秘的数据，我也很乐意帮助你，但……要是长老能确保你加入我们就好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen3_00007058_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you think you could recaliber the biometrics readers so they recognize me as a user?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你能不能重新调整一下生物识别读取器让它们认出我是用户？

ESP.ORIGINAL: First of all? Some reading material. I heard there were some Chinese Pre-War books scattered in the Mojave, meant for assassins and infiltrators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么首先，我需要一些书。我听说莫哈维沙漠里散落着一些战前的中国书籍，是给刺客和渗透者准备的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen4_00007053_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two volumes of such "Chinese Army: Special Ops Training Manual" might be a good start for me to put my Chinese reading abilities to test.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两卷那种《中国军队训练手册》可能是测试我中文阅读能力的好开端。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen4_00007053_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Secondly, I would require another of those Chinese Stealth Armors. Yeah, even a lesser and older generation model.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其次，我还需要另一件中式隐形装甲。对，就那种是小更老的型号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen4_00007053_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will cannibalize this one to understand how yours works, and I will try to temper with the springlock system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会拆了那个来了解你这件的工作原理，然后我会试着调整一下识别锁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen4_00007053_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你都需要什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, bring me these things. Once you have everything, come back to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你先把这些东西带给我。找到了就回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen5_00007055_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm borrowing the armor set. Will need to study it a bit before attempting anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我先借用下这套装甲。在做任何尝试之前都需要再仔细研究一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen5_00007055_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I have also made some side-research in the meantime. Bore quite useful fruits actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。同时我也做了一些调查。也收获了不错的成果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen6_0000705B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently, the US Army also toyed with similar biometric readers in some experimental combat armors... but the idea was eventually shelved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，美国陆军也在一些实验性作战装甲上摆弄了类似的生物识别读取器……但这个想法最终没能实现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen6_0000705B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was able to get some documentation about those lost variants. Mechanically, I can now reconfigurate whatever blocks your suit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从上面能获取部分关于那些遗失型号的技术文件。从机械结构层面，我现在能重新配置阻止你护甲运行的任何组件
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen6_0000705B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, so here the books and the armor... excellent! There's just one last problem now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，这是书和装甲…太好了！现在还有最后一个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen6_0000705B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then, the mission's still on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，任务还在继续！
