ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen6_0000705C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, I could recalibrate the biometric readers for your use and your use only, but the problem now is accessing the software that runs them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我可以把这些生物识别读取器重新校准到只认你一个人——但现在的问题是，怎么访问控制它们的软件系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen7_0000705E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would need a... recognized interface. Some kind of proxy to pilot the system and input the new modified bio-entries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一个……经过认证的接口。某种能够操控系统并输入新修改生物识别数据的代理程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen7_0000705E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assume that before the war, recalibrating the readers from one suit's user to another was done through large computerized systems, back in China.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我推测在战前，要将装甲读取器从一个使用者重新校准至另一人，应当是通过中国的中央计算机系统完成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen7_0000705E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much mobile nor optimized, but ensured a certain... secrecy. No real need for the suit to change hands during a mission in foreign lands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然机动性与性能优化不足，但确保了某种……保密性。在境外任务中，护甲无需更替使用者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen7_0000705E_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What type of problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么问题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gua-nyin? Please, show me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 关-尹？请给我看看…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen8_00007060_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! G.U.A.N.Y.I.N! Yeah, there was something referencing that in the internal circuitry of the armor!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！观音！对的，在装甲的内部电路中有一些东西与其相关！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen8_00007060_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems like some HUD or Interface assisting the armor. So, this was a limited-produced prototype after all. Taggart was right, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来像是一些辅助装甲的HUD或界面。果然，这就是那个限量生产的原型机。塔格特终究是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen8_00007060_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me try something quick... Let's see if it can input my modifications to the readers through that thing...
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我快试一下……看看能否通过那个东西把我的修改输入到读取器上……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen8_00007060_4.wav
NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent! It works! Here, the Stealth Armor should be wearable now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！起作用了！给，隐形装甲现在应该可以穿了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen8_00007060_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was a special chip coupling the Armor. It's labelled as "Guanyin".
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个特殊的芯片连接着装甲。它的标注是“观音”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good hunt, then. Perhaps an inbuilt interface the armor had? Could help me access the internal stuff very easily!
ESP.TRADUIT: 找得好。也许这是装甲的内置接口？可以让我更容易的访问内部！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe Heathen [05007045] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\EthanVoice\Stealthten_topicheathen8_00007061_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will try to find something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来找找看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, don't flatter me so soon! What kind of technology are we talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，别见面就夸我！说的是哪种科技？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle1_00007065_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need to recaliber an AER-12 laser rifle? Or perhaps adjust the lenses of a T-45d helmet? I could do that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要重新校准AER-12激光步枪吗？或者调教下T-45d头盔的镜头？我能做到！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle1_00007065_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard you're the engineering expert here at the Fort. I'm trying to restore a rare piece of tech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说你是地堡中的工程专家。我在修复一件罕见的科技物品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. I... Yeah, I think I may have an idea of what THAT is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…我想，我想我可能知道 那个 是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle2_00007068_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surprisingly similar to something I read about in the "War Cloaking" chapter of the complete edition of "U.S. Covert Operations Manual".
ESP.TRADUIT: 它与我在《美国机密行动手册》完整版里的“隐形战争”章节中读到的东西惊人地相似。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle2_00007068_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That would be a "Hei Guei" Stealth Suit, a special pre-war weapon from the Republic of China. A very rare find!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一件“黑鬼”隐形装甲，一种来自中国的战前特殊武器。非常罕见的发现！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle2_00007068_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a bit more delicate. (Show Stealth Suit)
ESP.TRADUIT: 它更精巧一些。（展示隐身服）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hum, yeah, go fetch it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，当然，去拿吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle2_00007069_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahem, let me bring it here first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，等我先拿过来的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I also read about the existence of American deadcopies of the Hei Guei. Big MT and the UAF both did propose prototypes back in the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还读到美国有黑鬼的仿制技术。大山脉与联合先进部队当年都提出过原型机方案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle4_0000706D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assuming they created those by retro-engineering Hei Gueis, I would assume they found a way to get rid of the original springlocks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 假设他们是通过对黑鬼进行逆向破解来创造这些，我认为他们找到了一种方法来绕开原来的识别锁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle4_0000706D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is probably a way... but I don't know it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是个办法……但我不确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle4_0000706D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, the armor is as good as trash?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，这装甲现在就跟废品一样吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if you're down for a read, I could hand you my copy of "U.S. Covert Operations Manual". Could give you some ideas if you're smart enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有兴趣阅读的话，我可以把我的《美国机密行动手册》复印件给你。如果你足够聪明，可能会从中得到一些启示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle5_0000706E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... could also try seeking help from the Brotherhood of Steel but... they are more likely to confiscate that thing from you than helping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你……也可以找钢铁兄弟会帮忙，但…他们更有可能没收你的东西，而非帮你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle5_0000706E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have a small fortune to spare you could also try reaching out to Madam Ling but well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有钱，你也可以试着联系凌女士，但是……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle5_0000706E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got any ideas where I might find help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道哪里能帮到我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here it is! An excellent book, but... a bit long and tedious at time. Still, very complex but very complete at the same time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是！一本著作，尽管…某些章节冗长乏味……还很复杂，但同时也很详细完整！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle51_00007072_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope you find a way around with it. Best of luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你能找到办法。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle51_00007072_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see if the U.S. Covert Operations Manual can help me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们看看美国机密行动手册能不能帮上忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: An unwise choice but... No one really knows where they went after Helios One. They might be tricky to meet now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不太明智的选择，但是……没人知道他们在太阳神一号之后去了哪里。可能很难再见到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle52_00007073_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best of luck to you though!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle52_00007073_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will try my luck with the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去找钢铁兄弟会碰碰运气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madam Ling is a... "travelling scientist for-hire". A bit shady, really if we want to be honest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凌女士是一位... “受雇的旅行科学家”。说实话，有点可疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle53_00007074_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grew up as a member of the Shis, until they ousted her for her violent tendencies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她小时候是始族的一员，直到后来因暴力倾向被驱逐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle53_00007074_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As soon as she left San Francisco, she quickly built her own tech network, often putting her at odds with the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她一离开旧金山，就迅速建立了自己的科技网络，这常常使她与兄弟会产生冲突。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle53_00007074_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, heard that a lot of top-notches hig-tech devices that enter the black market can always be traced back to her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，听说很多进入黑市的顶级高科技设备都能追溯到她身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle53_00007074_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madam Ling?
ESP.TRADUIT: 凌女士 ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: To restore a pre-war Chinese device, or just modify it, the Shi will always be your best bet, even over the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要修复一个战前的中国设备，或者只是改进它，始族永远是你最好的选择，兄弟会也比不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle53_00007077_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This being said, you don't want to go all the way up to San Francisco for that matter, I bet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 话虽如此，我猜，你不会想为了这件事而一路跑到旧金山吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle53_00007077_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fortunately for you, Madam Ling is currently in the Mojave, with all the expertise you would expect of a former Shi.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的是，凌女士现在在莫哈维，她拥有你所期望的前始族人的所有专业知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle53_00007077_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And how exactly could this Madam Ling possibly help me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而这位凌女士又怎么能帮我呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: She has been spotted in McCarran airport, working on a contract for the OSI. She is THAT good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人看到她在麦卡伦机场，正为科学办公室履行一份合同。她就是那么厉害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle53_00007078_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, beware, her services might be... a little expensive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，小心，她的服务可能…会有点贵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Danielle [05007047] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\DanielleVoice\Stealthten_topicdanielle53_00007078_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent, where can I find her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，我能在哪里找到她？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of questions, most of which I have no inclination in replying to, at least in detail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题太多，其中大部分我不想回答，至少不想详细回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling1_0000806B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just know that I am member of the Black Shenlong, a cabal centered around Sausalito, under the rule of our six "Junfas'".
ESP.TRADUIT: 只需要知道我是黑神龙的一员就行，这是一个以索萨利托为中心的阴谋集团，由我们六个“军阀”统治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling1_0000806B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like our diminished Shi's cousins, we are among the finest gunsmiths and scientists. And we put that to good use... unlike them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我们被衰弱的表亲始族一样，我们同样是最优秀的枪匠和科学家。而且很好地利用了这一点……不像他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling1_0000806B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unlike the Gun Runners, our products rarely abide to NCR's weapon laws, and are thus illegal... and only available on the black-market.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与军火贩子不同，我们的产品鲜少遵守NCR的武器管制法——因此被定义为非法流通品……且仅通过黑市流通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling1_0000806B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This being said, the NCR is all too happy to turn a blind eye on our business, even more so on the frontier where our products flow like a river...
ESP.TRADUIT: 话虽如此，NCR却乐于对我们的业务睁一只眼闭一只眼，尤其是在我们的产品像河流一样涌动在前线的情况下……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling1_0000806B_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh, but enough chatter, is everything clearer to you, peasant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，说够了，你明白了吗，乡巴佬？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling1_0000806B_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Black Shenlong? Junfas? And what kind of products are we talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑神龙？军阀？我们说的是什么样的产品？

ESP.ORIGINAL: "That would require my attention"?! "I" decide what requires my attention or not, punk!
ESP.TRADUIT: “那需要我的关注”？！“我”来决定什么需要我的关注，混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling2_0000806D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will address me with the proper level of respect, or my guards will throw you out of here... in the form of a miserable corpse!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要对我表现出应有的尊重，否则我的守卫会把你扔出去……以一具悲惨尸体的形式下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling2_0000806D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that clear, bumpkin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了吗，土包子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling2_0000806D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not here for any of that. I have found a special technology that would require your attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来听这些的。我找到一种特殊的技术，需要你的关注。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much better. I will let your disrespect slide for this time. Ah, tell me then, "customer" what brings you here, to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好多了。这次我会放过你的不敬。嗯，告诉我吧，"顾客"，是什么让你来到这儿，来到我面前？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling21_00008070_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apologies, Lady Ling. I was carried out by unproper haste, and my urgent need for your expertise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我的失礼，凌女士。此番仓促因情势所迫，对您专业能力的迫切需求使我行事欠妥。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stupid? Huh, I think you are gravely mistaken. No one talk like that to a Black Shenlong's representative!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蠢？哈，我觉得你惹大祸了。没有人改这样对黑神龙的代表说话！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling22_00008071_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guards? Eliminate this clown, ON THE SPOT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 守卫？抹除这个小丑，现在马上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling22_00008071_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're arrogant as you're stupid to think you can talk to me like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你傲慢自大，愚蠢地以为自己可以这么对我说话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah! A respectful and well mannered "customer"! Ahhh, for once!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！一位有礼有雅的“顾客”！啊，终于！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling3_00008077_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your manners don't quite match your... rugged and disgracious appearance, but the contrast certainly won't play in your disfavor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您的举止和您粗犷和不体面的外表……不太相称。但这种反差反倒成就了您的独特魅力
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling3_00008077_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am Madam Ling, indeed. Finest of the Black Shenlong scientists and artificers. What bring you to me, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是凌女士。最优秀的黑神龙科学家和工匠。什么风把您吹来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling3_00008077_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madam Ling, I have wandered many miles just to have an audience with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凌女士，我不远万里来就是为了见您一面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Pre-War Dragoon Armor? That far from the coast? An interesting find, really! You have my attention, alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一件战前龙特战队装甲？离海岸那么远的地方？真是个有趣的发现！你引起了我的注意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling211_00008074_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What could possibly interest you in such a suit? Are you perhaps here looking to restore its Stealth field generator?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么让你对这样的装甲感兴趣？你是来修复隐形力场发生器的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling211_00008074_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Show Stealth Suit)
ESP.TRADUIT: （展示隐形装甲）

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Sight) You are wasting my time... and my patience!
ESP.TRADUIT: （叹气）你在浪费我的时间……还有我的耐心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling211_00008084_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I didn't bring the thing I came for...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…没把东西带过来…

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah! Not a surprise. "Zhongshi Suo", top-notch Sino-manufactured biometric readers. Finest technology of the People's Republic of China.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！不出意外。“中式锁”，中国制造的顶尖生物识别读取器，中华人民共和国最先进的技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling2111_00008076_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My ancestors were a much-more advanced civilization than the one of your forebears, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，我的祖先比你的祖先文明先进得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling2111_00008076_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Dragoon Armor cannot be hijacked like any of these... primitive Power Armors from before the Armageddon. The Locks forbid it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 龙特战队装甲可不会像那些……大战前的原始动力装甲一样满地跑。锁具系统杜绝了这种可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling2111_00008076_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are talking about a complex system mixing facial recognition systems with finger and footprints memory fibers. You won't be able to bypass it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们讨论的是一套复合型安全系统——整合了面部识别、指纹/足纹记忆纤维技术。你不可能绕过它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling2111_00008076_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to first get rid of strange springlocks embedded into it. There is a biometric lock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试图摆脱里面奇怪的生物识别锁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, do not think of me as a fool. You were drawn to me by the tales of my infancy amongst the Shi, like a bee to honey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 得了吧，别把我当傻瓜。你如蜂恋蜜般被吸引至此——无非是听闻了我在始族度过的幼年传奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling4_0000807B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: All of us Shi descend from a Chinese submarine's crew that survived the onslaught of Armageddon, and reformed our own culture in this cursed land.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们始族都是中国潜艇艇员的后代，在世界末日的的浩劫中幸存，在这片受诅咒的土地上重塑了属于我们的文明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling4_0000807B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In this Wasteland, nearly two centuries after the fire, WE are the last echo of this once great civilization from across the sea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 烈火在这片荒原上燃烧的近两个世纪后，我们是这个曾经伟大的文明在大洋彼岸的最后回声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling4_0000807B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, our cousins who remained in San Francisco are a decadent bunch, but we of the Black Shenlong? Our black market is the crown jewel of the West!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我们留在旧金山的表亲正在衰落，但我们这些黑神龙呢？我们造就的黑市是西方皇冠上的明珠！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling4_0000807B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your ancestors? What do you even mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的祖先？你到底是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lack of luck... but perhaps fate in your case? People are brittle, and erode quickly, but technology... technology endures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 气运不济……但对你而言或是天命所归？人类脆弱不堪，在废土风沙中衰朽，但科技……科技永存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling5_0000807C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The continued annoyance of the Brotherhood of Steel and Prospector Gangs nowadays prove us that artifacts of the past survive... for far too long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如今钢铁兄弟会和寻宝团伙的持续骚扰向我们证明，过去的人造物仍然存续……存续的太久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling5_0000807C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But still, all hope is not lost. Two centuries have probably eroded what was once an inviolable security system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，希望的火种还未熄灭。两百年的光阴，或许已将那曾坚不可摧的安全协议腐蚀成风中残烛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling5_0000807C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What once required the brightest minds of this continent to neutralize could now be bypassed by far weaker spirits. Well, not yours, of course...
ESP.TRADUIT: 曾需整片大陆最杰出的智者方能破解之物，如今竟被些泛泛之流绕道得手。当然……您自然不在此列。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling5_0000807C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This armor is Pre-War! How can such complex springlocks still be functional after all this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这具装甲是战前产物！如此复杂的锁结构历经沧桑为何还未失效？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, resorting to flattery, are we? Good, you hit the first of my right spots. The second? That would be a lucrative offer made to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？我们开始诉诸奉承了，是吗？很好，你确实戳到了我的第一个点上。至于第二个嘛……那得是份真金白银的买卖了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling6_0000807D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could indeed bypass the security of this armor for you. I could also reconfigure the biometric readers to match your profile and yours only.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以帮你绕过装甲的安保。我还可以重新配置生物识别读取器来匹配你的资料，而且只匹配你的资料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling6_0000807D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that service comes at a cost. 20000 Caps. Non-negotiable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这种服务是有代价的。20000瓶盖。口不二价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling6_0000807D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't be able to bypass it, alright. But you? You definitely have the talents to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可我确实绕不开它，但您呢？相信您绝对有才能做到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much obliged. Now that the service has been paid, I will relieve you of that springlocked little beauty. Let's fix that for you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 承蒙惠顾。服务费既然已结清，我便替您救出这锁美人儿……并为您调试妥当。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling7_00008080_1.wav
NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh, no, not that circuit...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，不，不是那个电路……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling7_00008080_3.wav
NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh. Oh, would that even...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。哦，那会不会……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling7_00008080_5.wav
NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huhhh, yeah... Ah, that's the right circuit! Huh and then let's adjust the fibers...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，对了…啊，这才是正确的电路！嗯，然后让我们调整一下纤维……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling7_00008080_7.wav
NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, perfect, here it is. You will now proudly be able to wear that Dragoon Armor with pride!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，完美，成了。你现在可以自豪地穿上龙特战队的装甲了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling7_00008080_9.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A pleasure really to carry out business with you dear M...."[%] "... hum, I can't pronounce that right...
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴能与您做生意，亲爱的..姆...."[%] "…嗯，我读不准……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling7_00008080_10.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, 20000 caps in full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，正好20000瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh! Then I'm afraid that I won't be able to help you in any way. But, if you do comply with the sum requested, we could discuss it further...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！那恐怕我爱莫能助。不过，如果你肯如数支付这笔款项，倒也不妨再议……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling7_00008081_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have that kind of absurd amount of money to spare!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可没有那么富余的钱！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh! You're asking the expertise and craftmanship of the Black Shenlong. You won't find that kind of help elsewhere, animal!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！你索求的是黑神龙的技艺。在别的地方可寻不到这样的帮助，畜生！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topicling8_00008082_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too expensive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太贵了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A weird nickname, isn't it? What kind of gun for hire would call itself "the Angel", right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的绰号，不是吗？什么样的佣兵会自称“天使”呢，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim1_0000946B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But see, a man doesn't always choose his own fame... nor even the appelations that... follows behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你看，人往往选不了自己的名声如何……更何况……紧随其后的名号呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim1_0000946B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the simple choice of either adopting what they call you... and turn it into your greatest weapon... or rather spend an eternity fleeing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这选择再简单不过——要么将那强加于你的名号……锻成利刃……要么一生奔逃于其阴影之下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim1_0000946B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm "The Seraphim".
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我就是“炽天使”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be "The Seraphim", I take it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜，你一定就是“炽天使”吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh. Given your charming clothing's assortment, I'm sure you spent some time looting my... subordinates belongings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈。看你那些迷人的衣服，我相信你肯定花了些时间…洗劫我手下的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim2_0000946D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No? Didn't found any letters on them? Or perhaps you just didn't read them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有？没在他们身上找到任何信件？亦或者你根本没去读？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim2_0000946D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's okay, no shame in just being the trophy-collecting type. We can't all be curious about the bodies we pile up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无妨，爱收集战利品也没什么丢人的。毕竟不是谁都有闲心去研究自己垒的尸堆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim2_0000946D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who am I supposed to be? I have many names, depending on who you ask, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于我是谁？我有很多名字，这真的取决于你问的哪个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim2_0000946D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can call me "The Seraphim". That's the name many like to associate with me at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就叫我“炽天使”吧。现在很多人都喜欢用这个名字称呼我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim2_0000946D_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure we ever crossed paths. And you are supposed to be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定我们见过。你是？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why baiting you here? Well, how could I put it nicely...
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么把你引到这儿来？我该怎么说才好呢…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000946F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let us just say that I am after a particular... trinket. A trinket that YOU have very recently acquired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧，我在寻找一件特殊的……小玩意儿。一件你最近获得的小玩意儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000946F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And to be more specific, a trinket you have gone to great length to restore to working order. Wasn't expecting that kind of commitment, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更确切地说，这是一件你费了很大劲才好用了的小玩意儿。倒是真没想到你会如此执着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000946F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The second proper question would be to ask you why exactly baiting me here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么第二个问题应该是你为什么把我引到这儿来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No bounty, no. But to me? You're worth much more that just a bunch of caps on a paper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有悬赏。但对我来说呢？你的价值远不止是纸面上的一堆瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim12_00009471_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had my associates not all acted like stunted Centaurs, we could have avoided that unpleasant situation, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不是我的同事们都表现得像发育不良的多脚兽，我们真的可以避免这种不愉快的局面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim12_00009471_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But alas, they are all six feet under the ground, thanks to you. And now, my business in the Mojave has overextended its planning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可惜啊，多亏了你，他们几个如今都葬在核废土六尺之下。而现在我在莫哈维的工作，也因此有点超出预期了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim12_00009471_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure sent a lot of men after me, Mr. "Seraphim". Don't recall any bounty placed on my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可真是派了不少人追杀我啊，炽天使先生……不过我怎么不记得有人悬赏要我的头？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, in a certain way, you would almost be right. Close close my dear Courier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，某种程度上讲，你几乎是对的。来近点，近点，我亲爱的邮差！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim3_00009473_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The truth is, I'm just bored of waiting for the results of incompetents idiots trying to best you. Really, no one is best served than by themselves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实在的，干等一群蠢货绞尽脑汁妄图压你一头的结局，实在是腻味了。说到底——能指望的，从来只有自己！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim3_00009473_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also have exhausted my patience and have no intentions of running after you anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也受够了，再也不想跟着你屁股后面追了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim3_00009473_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bait? You're the one trapped here with me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 咬勾？你才是那条被我钓上的猎物！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bingo! Smart one, exactly what I told the others about!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对头！真聪明，和我跟别人说的一样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_00009475_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, to be honest with you, I really came a long way just to claim this particular "relic of the past".
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实在的，我千里迢迢专程赶来，就为拿下这件“旧世遗物”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_00009475_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, not for my personal use, no. I have no needs for such a fancy piece of technology. No, I 'm just a man on a contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不是给我自己用的，没必要。我不需要这么花哨的科技。我只是个受合同约束的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_00009475_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My employers knew about that thing for a long time, how it was likely resting on the Colorado's riverbed... They have their own ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的雇主很早就知道那东西的存在，知道它可能静静躺在科罗拉多的河床上……他们自有手段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_00009475_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why before my crew got here, I hired the Scrap Divers to collect the artifact for me. You're smart, you know how that ended.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以在我派手下打扫之前，先雇了拾荒者帮我收集藏物。你很这么聪明，应该清楚结局如何了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are after the Stealth Suit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找隐形装甲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I take what I need to complete my contracts. That much is certain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿必须的东西履行我的合约。这点当然毋庸置疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_00009477_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But indeed, the gear of any competent merc is bound to include toys and memories from unsavory jobs. We do all collect our pounds of flesh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但说实在的，但凡有点能耐的佣兵，行头里总少不得沾着腌臜差事的“小玩意”与记忆。毕竟在这行当里，谁还没攒下过几磅血肉贡品？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_00009477_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given my helmet, you are probably now realizing this isn't my first job involving a Hei Guei Chinese Stealth Armor. That would be quite right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于我的头盔，你可能意识到了这不是我第一次参与涉及中国黑鬼隐形装甲的工作。很对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_00009477_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And let just say that that Recon helmet of that Brotherhood Knight that went to hell and beyond to keep that thing out of my hands is...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不妨直说吧——那位钢铁兄弟会骑士拼死守护侦察头盔、生怕它落入我手的模样……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_00009477_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: ... part of my trinkets as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: …也是我收集到的小玩意儿之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_00009477_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You too seem to like collecting... trinkets, given your current get-up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你也痴迷收藏……小玩意儿，瞧瞧你这身行头？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, she is a beauty, that much is certain. And that's not even some kind of boring Pre-War artifact or rarity, no no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，它可是个美人，这点毋庸置疑。而且它甚至不是什么无聊到老掉牙的战前古董或稀世珍品——不，绝对不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000947A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This baby is a pure product of the Wasteland! A one of a kind revolver-shotgun, handcrafted by the Gun Runners specifically for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这宝贝儿是土生土长的废土货！独一无二的左轮霰弹枪，是军火贩子专门为我手工打造的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000947A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got the punch of your average scattergun, yeah, but she's as easy to draw and unload as the swiftest pistol you could find out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然威力只和普通霰弹枪不相上下，但她和你能找到的拔枪最快的快枪一样快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000947A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I call her "Angel Eyes". Quite a fitting name, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫她“天使之眼”。很合适，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000947A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's quite a fancy looking sidearm I see at your side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看你带着把很漂亮的配枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last bastion of the TRUE American government. The Enclave, who else would have financed my expedition?
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国政府真正的最后堡垒。英克雷啊，还能有谁会资助我的探险？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000947D_1.wav
NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You actually believed me? AHAHAHAHAH!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么？你真信我？啊哈哈哈哈哈 ! !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000947D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My employers... let's just say, it is only a group of... notable individuals across the Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的雇主们…这么说吧，就是一群…废土上有头有脸的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000947D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Outfit, the... Syndicate... they come under many names. Mercs, killers, slavers... a menagerie so rotten you may never want to cross.
ESP.TRADUIT: “组织”、“财团”…这帮人的名头多到数不清。佣兵、杀手、奴隶贩子……一窝烂到骨子里的杂碎，招惹他们准没好果子吃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000947D_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But them, unlike many other hooligans, have banded together to achieve... regional control over the wastes. ALL the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，与遍地乱跑的其他混混不同，他们联合起来实现了……控制了废土一部分。就是整个废土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000947D_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: California is already under their boots. So is most of Utah, Wyoming and even far Eastern places. The Mojave will soon follow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加州已经在他们的长袖下了。犹他州、怀俄明州甚至远东地区的大部分地区也是如此。莫哈韦沙漠也将紧随其后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000947D_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, crossing my path unfortunately means that you are also interfering with their interests. A shame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧，碰见我可真不巧——这意味着你也踩进了他们利益的雷区。真遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000947D_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your employers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的雇主是？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahahaha... Seems much less of a safe inviolable haven, right? I wouldn't blame you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈哈哈……这下看起来没那么安全，没那么隐私了，对吧？这我不怪你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000947C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not the only one who's ever dealt with that crooked machine-god of "Mister House". Well, the one who dealt with him the most certainly...
ESP.TRADUIT: 和那位机关算尽的机器神豪斯先生打过交道的，可不止你一个。不过要论真把他收拾服帖的那另说……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000947C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I entered the same way I reprogrammed those puny Securitrons. By making my breakout small, and my infiltration discrete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进来的方式和破解那些小机器人如出一辙——搞点小动静，再偷偷渗透进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000947C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's only a matter of hours before House figures out that the rumoured intrusion was pretty much real. But by that point...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不出几小时，豪斯就会查出传闻中的入侵确有其事。可等到那时…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000947C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, let's just say I will be long gone and my business here LONG concluded!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这么说吧，我早溜了，那会这儿的工作 早 结束了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000947C_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... How the hell did you manage to enter in my Presidential Suite and evade House's security?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等……你到底是怎么躲过豪斯的安保溜到我的总统套房里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahahaha... Seems much less of a safe inviolable haven, right? I wouldn't blame you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈哈哈……这下看起来没那么安全，没那么隐私了，对吧？这我不怪你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000C838_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes Man? That's what you call that thing you used to usurp Mister House? Funny thing really!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好好先生？你就是用那玩意儿篡了豪斯先生的位置？可真幽默！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000C838_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's funnier is that not one of the security systems were changed since House's days. One of you two is incompetent it seems!
ESP.TRADUIT: 更有趣的是，从豪斯掌权到现在，整套安保系统居然没都更新过，看来你俩总得有个不称职啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000C838_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I entered the same way I reprogrammed those puny Securitrons. By making my breakout small, and my infiltration discrete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进来的方式和破解那些小机器人如出一辙——搞点小动静，再偷偷渗透进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000C838_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's only a matter of hours before your smiley friend figures out the rumoured intrusion was pretty much real. But by that point...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不出几小时，你那面带笑容的朋友就会查出传闻中的入侵确有其事。可等到那时…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000C838_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, let's just say I will be long gone and my business here LONG concluded!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这么说吧，我早溜了，那会这儿的工作 早 结束了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000C838_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... How the hell did you manage to enter in my Presidential Suite and evade Yes Man's security?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等……你是怎么躲过好好先生的安保溜到我的总统套房里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you... butchered the brains of the security system! Don't you remember?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，是你…可是你把安保系统的“大脑”剁碎了啊！还记得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000C839_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That eulogy was quite of a fun touch from that monkey of House. Robo-god really thought himself human, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯那铁皮猴子的悼词倒挺幽默，机器神真把自己当人类了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000C839_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But yeah, now that no one is monitoring the Securitrons, it was a piece of cake to enter this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但确实，既然没有人监控安保系统，进入这个地方就是小菜一碟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim13_0000C839_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... How the hell did you manage to enter in my Presidential Suite?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等……你是怎么溜到我的总统套房里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like the term "murder". It means they stood a chance at any moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不喜欢谋杀这种词，听着像是他们随时有过翻盘机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000A461_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did I try to put that miserable crew down? Because they tried to DOUBLE CROSS ME!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为什么要杀了那群可怜的船员？因为他们试着 欺 骗 我 ！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000A461_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had struck an arrangement, and quite a generous one with Miss Cousteau. We knew each other since a long time, I expected... better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和库斯托小姐明明敲定过协议，还是份肥得流油的协议。老相识这么多年，我原以为……她能更上道些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000A461_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cousteau located what I paid her to find, but then immediately sent a message to the Shis. Tried to FUCK our arrangement over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 库斯托找到了我付钱让她去找的东西，但她马上给始族通风报信。试着他妈的搞砸我们的协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000A461_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old hag let her greed unchecked. And that's why her and all her little friends are now resting at the bottom of the Colorado.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老巫婆任凭她的贪婪肆虐不收着点儿。这就是她和她所有的小伙伴现在都在科罗拉多河底躺着的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000A461_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Scrap Divers... Why did you and you goons murder them if they were working for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 废品搜潜者…既然他们为你们工作，那为什么要谋杀他们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps. But there's something I learnt the hard way. Your underlings, your responsibility. Cousteau brought them all to this grave, not me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧。但有件事我是用血的教训明白的。你的手下会如何，也是你的责任。库斯托才是把他们带进坟墓的元凶，与我无关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000A463_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But even if she didn't play that stupid game. They all knew too much about the entire charade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但就算她没耍那蠢把戏。那帮人也知道的太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000A463_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mere reason why you ended up sticking your nose in my business is the proof they were too chatty, unreliable and stupid beyond their control.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最后能插手我的工作这恰恰证明那帮人管不住嘴、靠不住，还蠢得无可救药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000A463_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the end, they were all just loose ends that needed to be cut. Sooner or later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正到最后，他们最后都得被清理干净。早晚的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000A463_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cousteau double-crossed you, not her men. They were innocent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是库斯托捅了你刀子，她的人又没干。他们是无辜的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, yes you did! Was quite a surprise for us when we came back to finish the job, really!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，是，你处理好了！当我们回来打扫的时候，确实是个惊喜，不假！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000EE5E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In a way, with enough hindsight, you did us quite a favor. Would have almost been tempted to propose you a place in my crew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 某种意义上，事后再回头看，你确实立了功。我差点给你在团队里留了个位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000EE5E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But well, there is no more crew, thanks to you. Still, when you killed the little mouse, we were all furious. ESPECIALLY me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但也多亏了你，我们散伙了。不过，但你宰了那只小老鼠后，我们都气炸了。尤其是我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000EE5E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could have... interrogated her. Cooked her long enough for her to squeal us the location of the Suit. We too have our ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们本可以...好好审问她。慢慢折磨，撬出隐形装甲的下落。我们自有手段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000EE5E_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You figured out the location of the Suit on your own. But us? We were back to square one until we heard of you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你自己找到了装甲的位置。那我们怎么办？在得知你的消息前，我们可是从头找起...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000EE5E_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should thanks me. I ridded you of the only one that survived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你该好好谢我。我帮你处理好了幸存者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lindy? Oh! You mean that little mouse that survived all her little friends! Ah, yes, was it necessary?
ESP.TRADUIT: 林迪？哦！你说的是那只从她所有的小伙伴尸堆中幸存下来的小老鼠吗？啊，对啊，有必要吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C037_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poor little soul Ahah! Well, she too was a loose end, even more since she saw all of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜的小灵魂啊哈哈！好吧，她也是个麻烦，目击到了我们后更是如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C037_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She could have tried "denouncing" us to the NCR forces at the Mojave Outpost? Well, it's the frontier. Facing legal repercutions, what a joke!
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是她想向莫哈韦前哨站的NCR部队揭发我们呢？开玩笑的，这他妈是前线！法律制裁？天大的笑话！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C037_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But like I said to the others, you don't half-punish people. Either you bury them all, or you don't. If one survives, that's botched business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但就像我对别人说的，不能半赏半罚。要么不留活口，要么别干。如果有个人活了下来，那工作做得拙劣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C037_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if it can cajole your brain, just know I gave her a good death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，如果能骗你心安的话，告诉你我给了她个善终。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C037_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What need was there to come back to kill Lindy? That was unecessary!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那林迪呢？杀她又有什么必要！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... Naughty fellow aren't you? Won the trust of a traumatized little Molerat, promised things, then got away with the Suit without looking back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀…真是个小滑头？骗取了那只创伤中的变种鼹鼠的信任，满嘴承诺，最后带着装甲头也不回地溜了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C833_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My men... these... imbeciles, couldn't get the job done the first time. So I went back there to finish the work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的人…那些……低能，没能一次性把工作做好。所以我回去收了尾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C833_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She squealed quite a bit I must admit. She didn't wanted to share the Suit's location, either that or she had found an unexpected accomplice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 必须承认她叫得挺欢。要么死咬装甲位置松口，要么…呵，找到了意外的同伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C833_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, in the end, there's nothing that my "Angel Eyes" can't solve with a good trigger movement...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，说到底，只要扳机扣到位，没有我的“天使之眼”解决不了的问题...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C833_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if it can cajole your brain, just know I gave her a good death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，如果能骗你心安的话，告诉你我给了她个善终。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C833_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, too bad for you. One of the Scrap Divers survived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，有个坏消息给你。可是有位废品搜潜者幸存了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullet(s) to the head you mean? "Angel Eyes" was never the cleanest of my weapons to be honest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准确说是霰弹枪爆头？说实话“天使之眼”可从来不是我最干净利索的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you should have heard what my guys had in store for her! The Lord of Turrets wanted to sell her to the Fiends for a couple more caps for exemple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你真该听听我的人要对她干什么！比如，炮塔之主想把她卖给恶魔帮换更多瓶盖子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My dear little Gin? She wanted to starve the little mouse then throw her into a Fire Gecko den! And trust me, the other one had worse ideas...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我亲爱的小金呢？她想饿死这只小老鼠，然后把她扔进火蜥蜴的洞穴里！相信我，另一个人的想法更糟…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I did let that rotten piece of flayed meat of Red Skull beat her to near death... but, we needed quick answers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，我是让红骷髅那块剥皮烂肉把她揍得半死……但当时我们需要急需答案！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A good death? A bullet to the head?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 善终？一枪爆头？！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, after all this talking... It was bound to end up in a uncivilized brawl to the death, wasn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 掰扯了这么久……最后还不是得靠野蛮的生死肉搏画上句号的，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000EE5F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ice on the cake, you buried my entire freak show, a little squad I had spent quite a time to assemble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 压垮骆驼的最后一根稻草，是你竟毁了我苦心经营的怪咖小队，我耗费数年心血才拼凑成的小团队（squad）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000EE5F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And despite all of that, it doesn't change anything here. "Courier 6", "Stealthenza"... I don't care how they call you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算如此，这儿什么也没改变。“6号邮差”，“隐身者”……我在乎他们现在怎么叫你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000EE5F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a man on a mission. That Suit? I'm going to peel it from your dismembered corpse!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我任务在身。那套装甲？等着我从你破烂的身体上撕下来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000EE5F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Square one? I抣l kill you the same way I killed her!
ESP.TRADUIT: 从头找起？我同样送你下去陪她！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, after all this talking... It was bound to end up in a uncivilized brawl to the death, wasn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 掰扯了这么久……最后还不是得靠野蛮的生死肉搏画上句号的，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed your little short-lived partner, and you buried my entire freak show, a little squad I had spent quite a time to assemble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宰了你那个短命的小跟班，你就毁了我苦心经营出来的怪胎秀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And despite all of that, it doesn't change anything here. "Courier 6", "Stealthenza"... I don't care how they call you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算如此，这儿什么也没改变。“6号邮差”，“隐身者”……我在乎他们现在怎么叫你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a man on a mission. That Suit? I'm going to peel it from your dismembered corpse!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我任务在身。那套装甲？等着我从你破烂的身体上撕下来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see if I can give you the same kind of "good death".
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看我能不能给你个同样的“善终”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Up until now! The Scrap Divers failed me, and I had to clean that up. My associates? Morons that didn't even ask you to hand us that Suit over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废品搜潜者搞砸了，我只能擦屁股。至于那帮蠢货？连让你把装甲交出来都他妈忘了提！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, and to say I was told you were a Paragon of Virtue! Was expecting some one-dimensional weakling, really, ready to surrender the Suit to me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵，亏他们还说你是道德典范！我真还以为就是个蠢软蛋，会乖乖交出装甲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you won't give it to me. No matter the offer, no matter the price. You won't compromise, I respect that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你不会的。无论筹码，无论代价。你都不会妥协，我敬你这点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, the "Courier" died when your fate crossed that suit. They call you "Stealthenza" now, isn't it that funny?
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，当你的命运披上了这套华服，邮差就已经死了。他们现在都管你叫什么“隐身者”了，是不是很有趣？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that doesn't change the fact that I still need your Suit to complete my contract. An unfortunate situation, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这改不了我仍需要你的装甲来完成我的合约。真是不幸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03D_5.wav
NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are worse places to die, don't you think? Omicron Facility... I will remember that bunker as your mausoleum, my dear "Stealthenza".
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方死起来不太惨，你说呢？欧米茄设施…我想那个地方会是你亲爱的陵墓，我亲爱的“隐身者”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C03D_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: All of that blood, rethoric and cruelty. All for that suit to slip again and again from your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 流了那么多血，撒了那么多谎，造了那么多孽。到头来这套装甲还不是再一次从你指缝里溜走

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of all the stuff I was told about you, the only thing that seemed to resurface was that you were the greyest bastard of all that part of the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那些破事里，我能听出来的就是你是莫哈维里最亦正亦邪的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C834_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The kind of pistolero that would drop hundreds of Stimpacks to the Followers Fort, then murder a family of seven in cold blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 白天往追随者要塞空投几百支治疗针，晚上灭门七口之家眼皮不眨，说的就是你这种两面抢手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C834_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I figure what they meant. A strictly business-type... and an intelligent one. Maybe you and I are not that dissimilar...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这下明白了。你是个纯粹的生意人…还很精明。也许你和我没那么不同……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C834_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that doesn't change the fact that I still need your Suit to complete my contract. An unfortunate situation, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这改不了我仍需要你的装甲来完成我的合约。真是不幸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C834_4.wav
NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are worse places to die, don't you think? Omicron Facility... I will remember that bunker as your mausoleum, my dear "Stealthenza".
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方死起来不太惨，你说呢？欧米茄设施…我想那个地方会是你亲爱的陵墓，我亲爱的“隐身者”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C834_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Buddy, you think you're tough? You're the Golden Gecko barking to the Deathclaw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，你觉得你很能打？你好像只冲着死亡爪叫的金蜥蜴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hum. I had heard concerning things about you, my dear Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯姆。我听说了你的一些事情，我亲爱的邮差。
