ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C835_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard you never were a force for good. A cruel wild card, that's what I was told about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都说你跟良善不沾边。残酷的混沌王牌，这就是你在我这儿的名片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C835_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must admit I expected some conniving little shit or just an idiotic blood-thirsty maniac... Not that kind of rotten soul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本以为会是个阴险的小杂碎，或者嗜血纯脑残…但没想是那种烂到骨子里的货色
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C835_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I see it now. You will mangle my corpse and torch half the Mojave before giving me a single fiber of that Suit. I respect that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看明白了。就算你玩烂我的尸体再防火烧了半个莫哈韦连一根装甲的纤维也不会给我。我敬你这点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C835_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that doesn't change the fact that I still need your Suit to complete my contract. An unfortunate situation, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这改不了我仍需要你的装甲来完成我的合约。真是不幸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C835_5.wav
NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are worse places to die, don't you think? Omicron Facility... I will remember that bunker as your mausoleum, my dear "Stealthenza".
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方死起来不太惨，你说呢？欧米茄设施…我想那个地方会是你亲爱的陵墓，我亲爱的“隐身者”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphim11_0000C835_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and your little circus just lacked cruelty and creativity. Lindy got it easy with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就凭你和那帮马戏演员，即缺了狠劲又没有创意。你们“打理”林迪的手段。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems like "Stealthtenza" and Little Buster didn't get along!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来隐身者和小捣蛋巴斯特没太合得来啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000C43A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was time, wasn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也是时候了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000C837_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the part where we maul each other?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该到我们互撕的环节了?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahahahah! Here comes the boxer!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈哈哈！拳击手登场啦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000CC35_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? How about I DISPLACE you to an early grave?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？我送你迁跃到进提前挖好的坟里怎么样？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D239_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dogtags? I can buy you a Power fist, if you're so tight on caps!
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗牌？我能帮你买个动力拳套，如果你手头这么紧的话！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D23A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A knife? Trying to stab me perChance? Ahahahah!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 小刀？不会是想捅我一刀？啊哈哈哈! !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D23B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Trying to chop some Bighorner Steaks out of me?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么？想从我身上切点大角羊排吗？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D23C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's next? The King send me his regards?
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来是什么？猫王向我致意？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D23D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come here boy! Time to hack some wood!
ESP.TRADUIT: 过来，孩子！是时候砍些木头了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D23E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Stealthtenza"? More like "Centurion" Stealthtenzus the Legion dog!
ESP.TRADUIT: “隐身者”？我看更像“百夫长”隐形哈巴狗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D23F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big hammer for such a small Stealth Suit! Ahahahah!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 锤子配隐身！啊哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D245_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mister hydraulic! Was looking for someone to fix my leaks! Ahahahah!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 液压先生！正愁没人给我堵漏呢！啊哈哈哈哈！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D246_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A toy? YOU BROUGHT A TOY?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩具？你 拿 来 了 把 玩 具 ？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D247_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The flag of the Old Word? Well, to each their fantasies...
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿了把旧世旗帜？行吧，各做各的春秋大梦……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D248_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! You killed old Nephi for that trash?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！杀了老内菲就为了这破烂？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D244_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brought enough ammo to AVENGE THEM ALL? AHAHAHAH!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 复仇的子弹带够了吗？啊哈哈哈哈哈！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D249_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Lucy gave it away? Well, I'm almost impressed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 瑞德.露西把它送人了？哇哦，我差点感动了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D24A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the matter? Hiding behind a scope?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么？想躲在瞄准镜后面？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D24B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems like someone martyred First Recon! Nice carbine though!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来有人把第一侦查营给献祭了！不过枪不错！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D255_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ohhhhh, such a cute gun! What's the name of that little fellow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗷哦，好可爱的枪！这小家伙叫什么名字？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D256_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Benny own plastic peashooter! OUTSTANDING!
ESP.TRADUIT: 本尼那把塑料玩具枪？绝了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D257_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... why am I hearing music out of that gun?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等下……为什么我能听到你那把枪在歌唱？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D258_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ratslayer? Got yourself killed already by that rifle or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 灭鼠者吗？你使用它自杀过了还是怎么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D259_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright mate, you're retiring replicants I guess...
ESP.TRADUIT: 行吧伙计，我猜你“毕业”了不少克隆人……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D25A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's that? A deformed and mutated Garand knockoff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这什么鬼东西？变异的山寨加兰德？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D25B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vaaance? It's me! Your one and only Vicky!
ESP.TRADUIT: 万斯？是我！你唯爱的维基！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You Comment (NAM2) : (imitate woman voice) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D25C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Green beams? Too poor for Plasma or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 射绿的？穷到用不起等离子武器是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D25D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Al-right. You are blowing up the entire bunker with that thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好-吧。你要把整个地堡轰上天吗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D264_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who do you think you are with that Plasma rifle? The Enclave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拿着把等离子步枪以为自己是谁？英克雷吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D265_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uuuuuuh! I'm so scared of your giant electric pylon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呜呜呜呜！你那个巨型电塔可把我吓坏了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D266_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is that? Captain Cosmos Gun? WHERE IS JANGLES!?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么鬼东西？宇宙队长的配枪？我强哥在哪里！？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D267_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a bad taste to glue bottle caps on your gun! Psss!
ESP.TRADUIT: 能把瓶盖粘在枪上的品味也是神了！𫫇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D268_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mister "Stealthtenza", no Power Armor found on the enemy! AHAHAHA!!
ESP.TRADUIT: “隐身者”先生，敌人身上并未发现动力装甲！啊哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You Comment (NAM2) : (imitate GUANYIN talking chip) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D269_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Gauss rifle? Will bury you alongside those coils and that OVERSIZED SCOPE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 高斯步枪？那些破线圈、巨型瞄准总有一天给你埋了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D26B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lady Gibson? You sure have changed! AHAHAHAH!
ESP.TRADUIT: 吉布森女士？你变了不少啊！啊哈哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D270_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, tell me you weren't the one to draw those beavers on that thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你，告诉我不是你把河狸画在上面的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D271_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Zap Glove? But... you're the one COVERED IN ELECTRONICS!?
ESP.TRADUIT: 电击拳套？但...你才是那个浑身带电的！？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D272_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's literally written "Hei Guei Bye Bye" on your launcher?! TALK ABOUT BAD OMENS!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的炮上真写着“黑鬼再见”吗？！那可要讲讲什么是坏兆头了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D273_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes "Stealthtenza"! Crawl like a coward! HIDE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好“隐身者”！藏起来像个懦夫！可躲好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicstealthten_0000D275_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Medecine? You are only delaying the INEVITABLE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 治疗？你结局 注 定 ！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimhe_0000D277_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Outfit has lost interest in that matter. Your ownership of the artifact won't be questioned by us anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 组织已对此事失去兴趣。你对该遗物的所有权，我们不再质疑.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0500D278] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_topicsyndicate_0000D27D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Furthermore, your murder of the esteemed and now regretted Seraphim won't be considered an aggression toward our organisation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再者，你谋杀备受尊崇且令人惋惜的炽天使之举，将不被视为对本组织的敌对行为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0500D278] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_topicsyndicate_0000D27D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is however our last warning. Interfere again with our interests, and we won't be so lenient next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这是最后的警告。若再敢染指我们的利益，下次可不会这般宽容。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0500D278] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_topicsyndicate_0000D27D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are things far more frightening than The Seraphim that dwells within our Syndicate's ranks...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们的团伙里，有远比炽天使更恐怖的存在……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0500D278] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_topicsyndicate_0000D27D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Steath Suit is and will remain mine. No matter the amount of bodies I need to pile up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这套隐身装甲过去是、将来也永远是我的。无论我脚下尸体磊多高。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is our last warning, never forget that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们最后的警告，永远不要忘记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0500D278] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MessengerVoice\Stealthten_topicsyndicate2_0000D27F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Love or hate me, YOU'RE GOING TO DIE HERE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 爱我也罢恨我也罢，你 都 会 死 在 这 ！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimco_0000D281_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you are, impious bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿，不虔诚的混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brigham Young [05004043] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\BrighamVoiceType\Stealthten_topiccombatbrig_00010282_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the power of the Lord... I CAST YOU DOWN!
ESP.TRADUIT: 以主之威…我降下神罚！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brigham Young [05004043] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\BrighamVoiceType\Stealthten_topiccombatbrig_00010283_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dumb as a Deathclaw, nowhere near as fast! Ahahah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 傻的像死亡爪，却没它快！啊哈哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gin Corbett [0500404A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\GinVoiceType\Stealthten_topiccombatgin1_0001029A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gotta aim, you little Gecko!
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞄准点，小蜥蜴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gin Corbett [0500404A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\GinVoiceType\Stealthten_topiccombatgin2_0001029B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead already? You're no worthy prey!
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了吗？你都不值得被捕猎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gin Corbett [0500404A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\GinVoiceType\Stealthten_topiccombatgin3_0001029C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What... What kind of monster are you?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是……你是什么怪物？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gin Corbett [0500404A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\GinVoiceType\Stealthten_topiccombatgin4_0001029D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the matter? Can't stand a few lasers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么回事？一点激光就受不了了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lord of Turrets [05004445] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LordofTurretsVoiceType\Stealthten_topiccombatLoT1_000102A1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My... my baby turret? YOU'RE GOING TO PAY FOR THAT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 宝宝…我的炮塔宝宝？你 要 付 出 代 价 ！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lord of Turrets [05004445] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LordofTurretsVoiceType\Stealthten_topiccombatLoT2_000102A2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No no no, not this one! My favorite turret!!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不不不，别杀这个！我最喜欢的炮塔！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lord of Turrets [05004445] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LordofTurretsVoiceType\Stealthten_topiccombatLoT2_000102A3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Euh, that's it bastard! I will avenge my turret!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，就这样，混蛋！我要为炮塔报仇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lord of Turrets [05004445] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LordofTurretsVoiceType\Stealthten_topiccombatLoT2_000102A4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orders to the Mk XII! Avoid damaging the target's armor!
ESP.TRADUIT: MkXII听好！避免伤害目标的护甲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lord of Turrets [05004445] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\LordofTurretsVoiceType\Stealthten_topiccombatLoT3_000102A5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because you killed me you moron? That's what you want to hear? That you TRIUMPHED OVER THE GREAT SERAPHIM?
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你杀了我，白痴？你想听这个？你 战 胜 了 伟 大 的 炽 天 使 ？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012294_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't enough for you, beat me with those cheap tricks of yours like Stimpacks spamming and loadsave abuses, noooo...
ESP.TRADUIT: 对你而言，靠治疗针滥用和读档作弊这种下三滥手段赢我还不够是吧？不不不...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012294_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you also had to take my precious "Angel Eyes" as a trophy? Because your stupid Pip Boy quest markers told you so? CUNT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 用你那破哔哔小子的任务标记当借口，连老子的“天使之眼”也抢走当战利品？！畜生！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012294_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you left my brain intact, my little friend, and that was your mistake... your LAST mistake!
ESP.TRADUIT: 可惜啊我的小朋友...你留了我这颗脑子完好无损，这将是你犯得错误...也是最后一个！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012294_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to CLAW you out of that cursed Stealth Suit of yours, BONE BY BONE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要用爪子把你从那套该死的隐身装甲里，一根骨头一根骨头地抠出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012294_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the... The Seraphim? Is that you? But you're dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么……炽天使？是你？但你死了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jan... janky toys? I'M THE SERAPHIM, YOU PIECE OF STEALTH-RELIANT DUMB IDIOT COWARD!
ESP.TRADUIT: 垃…垃圾玩具？我 就 是 炽 天 使，你 这 个 靠 隐 身 的 白 痴 懦 夫 ！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012295_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? Thought you had finally beat me? Guess what, I SURVIVED!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？你以为你终于打败我了？你猜怎么着，我 活 下 来 了 ！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012295_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, my... brain mostly, but this will be far sufficient to bury you once and for all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，准确来说…是我的大脑，但这足以一劳永逸的埋葬你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012295_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No no no! There will be no "Stealthtenza II", because this story ends for you now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不不不！不会再有“隐身者”第二部，因为这个故事对你而言就是结局了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012295_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I bury you, that Suit of yours will be sold to the highest bidder to finance me a better body!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我把你埋了，你那套装甲就会价高者得，卖来的钱刚好给老子换副更带劲的义体！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012295_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh? Is that another one of the janky toys of The Seraphim?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？是炽天使的又一个垃圾玩具吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? I'm Robobrain GA-75, model "T.H.E. S.E.R.A.P.H.I.M". At your service master!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我吗？我是机器脑，型号Ga - 75，模式”炽.天.使”。为您服务，主人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012296_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT THE HELL IS THAT QUESTION STEALTHTENZA? CAN'T EVEN RECOGNIZE MY OWN SYMBOL?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈算什么狗屁问题，隐身者？！连老子自己的标志都认不出了？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012296_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm The Seraphim, the one and only! And back for your cheeks, to avenge myself of the humiliation of having my magnificient brain trapped in a jar!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是炽天使，举世无双！此番归来，定要撕烂你的脸皮，洗刷我这伟大头脑被困在罐子里的奇耻大辱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012296_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah, I get it, you killed me, "How is that possible?", "Who transplanted your brain?"... All wonderful questions!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊对对对，我懂，你弄死我了，“”这怎么可能？”，“谁移植了你的脑子？”...都是些好问题
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012296_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Won't respond to any of that. Even in this meager form, I'm going to take a pleasure in peeling that Suit of yours, fiber by fiber!
ESP.TRADUIT: 才不告诉你，就算只剩这具残躯，老子也要一根纤维一根纤维地剥下你那套装甲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012296_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are going to even regret the day you were born!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要让你后悔从娘胎生出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\Seraphimbotvoice\Stealthten_topicrobobrains_00012296_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell are you even supposed to be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈到底是个什么玩意儿？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robo-Seraphim [05011A99] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahh, excellent. I have a variety of guns, armors and gadgets that may complement well that magnificent Stealth Armor of yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈，妙极了！我这儿有各式枪械、护甲和小玩意儿，准能配得上您那套神出鬼没的隐形装甲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012A8F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like to purchase some of your black market articles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想买一些你们在黑市上卖的货。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My expertise is very demanding and demanded, my dear "customer". I suggest you avoid bothering me without a decent business proposal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的技术可是高价难求的，亲爱的“顾客”。要是没有像样的买卖，建议你别来浪费我时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal2_00012A8E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing, I will be on my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事，我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some dragons like to hide with their jewels in the bowels of the Earth, hiding, waiting... worthless worms afraid of quitting their rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些龙类偏爱带着财宝蛰伏在地脉深处，藏匿着，等待着...不过是群不敢离开巢穴的懦弱蠕虫。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal0_00012E92_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Others are however much... wiser. Some prefer sharing their gems to mere mortals, giving them shards of their treasure to keep them... dociles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然更有睿智之龙...甘愿向凡人分享宝石，赐予财宝碎片，只为让羔羊们保持...驯顺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal0_00012E92_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Amongst the descendants of the Shih-huang-ti, few are those who remember the echoes of the civilisation we once belonged to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 始皇帝血脉中，仍记得我们曾属文明回响者十不存一...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal0_00012E92_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And fewer are those that remind what we were a mere decades ago. A bastion of innovation, one that even the Enclave and the Brotherhood feared.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而知晓我们几十年前辉煌者更如凤毛麟角。那时我们筑起创新堡垒，连英克雷与钢铁兄弟会亦为之胆寒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal0_00012E92_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What remains of the Shi now cower in our capital of Chinatown, making trinkets only for ourselves, fearing the day the NCR will inevitably annex us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如今的‘始族’龟缩在唐人街，只敢为自己制造些小玩意儿，终日恐惧NCR的吞并铁蹄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal0_00012E92_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those of us who refused and wished to share our "trinkets" were then labelled as "warmongers" and exiled, shoring left and right across California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我等拒绝苟活、愿分享‘玩具’者，却被冠以“战争贩子”之名，流落加州各处四海无依。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal0_00012E92_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You perhaps heard that us of the Black Shenlong now own the majority of the black market. This is a wrong and misleading statement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许听闻过黑神龙占据了黑市大半天地？那是谬传。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal0_00012E92_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We ARE the blackmarket...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们 就 是 黑市...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal0_00012E92_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Black Shenlong? What is that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑神龙？那是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hum! Which of the articles do you want to be informed about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯！你想了解那个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E97_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like some informations about your exclusives articles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了解下你们的独家商品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Shanxi Pistol is, like its name suggests, a direct descendant of the Shanxi-series handguns produced by our ancestors before Armageddon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如名所示，"陕西"手枪是我族先辈在战前生产的"陕西"系列手枪直系后裔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E98_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, it is not based on the debilitatingly ineffective Type 17 pistol, mind you, but rather of its improved variation the Type 26.
ESP.TRADUIT: 声明下，其基础并非那病怏怏的17式，而是改进型26式
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E98_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said Type 26, like the Type 25 "Zhu-Rong", added an inbuilt overheater while introducing an accelerating module, feature we retained in our product.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该型号与25式“祝融”同样搭载内置过热器，并首创加速模块，这些特性均在本作保留。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E98_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have however carried out our own improvements and enhancements for the Shanxi Pistol, notably with a modified chambering and reinforced barrel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为山西手枪实施了独家强化，特别改进了弹膛并加强了枪管。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E98_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This product can be chambered without issues in standard 9mm, but can also beneficiate of our unique high-tech 8.5mm projectiles for more... impact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该产品可兼容标准9mm弹药，但也可以受益于我们独特的高科技8.5毫米弹丸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E98_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the least fortunate, we can only propose our 8.5mm "Inferno", which will combust inside your targets as soon as the bullet reach them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于手头最紧的顾客，我们只推荐8.5毫米的“炼狱”弹，子弹一击中目标就会在体内燃烧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E98_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a few more caps, we can also propose "Radiant" ammo, where the bullet will explode into a flare nanoseconds after leaving the barrel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加点瓶盖，我们推荐“辐光”弹，这种子弹在离开枪管几纳秒后就会爆炸闪光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E98_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For bigger purses, I can however also suggest our special "Accelerated" ammo, where the acceleration module of the Shanxi is put to its best use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 手头最宽裕的顾客，我推荐我们的特殊“加速”弹药，陕西的加速模块能发挥最大的作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E98_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Such ammo will propel its special bullets at around 1800m/s, ensuring none of your enemies have any chance to survive once you pull the trigger...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种弹药将以大约1800米/秒的初速出膛，当你扣下扳机时，敌人的死亡证明已经开好了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E98_9.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like to know more about the Shanxi Pistol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想进一步了解下“陕西”手枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Zhiyuan is our most popular product at the moment. We scavenged its design from an older weapon used by our ancestors, German of origin, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: "致远"步枪是当前最畅销产品，其设计我觉得源自先祖使用的某款德系旧式武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E99_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It functions under the simple concept of Burstrifles. 3 individuals projectiles propelled one after another at such speed they seem to come together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 采用爆发步枪基础原理，三发弹头以超高速序贯射击，形成伪齐射效果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E99_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is a simple weapon, yet one that the uneducated of the NCR really appreciate and praise for its excellent effectiveness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽结构简单，却深受NCR底层文盲大头兵追捧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E99_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we could drastically increase its production, we of the Black Shenlong have no doubts it could someday even phase out the pitiful Service Rifle...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们能扩大生产规模，我们黑神龙迟早让那些可怜兮兮的军用步枪彻底淘汰…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E99_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like to know more about the Zhiyuan Burstrifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想进一步了解下“致远”爆裂步枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Hebei? A fancy piece of technology, really. It is a short sword, forged by our artisans with ancestral techniques used for past Chinese blades.
ESP.TRADUIT: “河北”？确实是件精致玩意儿。由匠人用古中国祖传技术锻造而成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E9A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The blade may be thin, but it is made from a mix of Hardsteel Alloy and Titanium shards. Sharp enough to bisect a sentry bot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刀身虽薄，但融合的硬钢合金与钛金属碎片却足以劈开哨兵机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E9A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The best touch of the weapon however remains in the inner circuitry path encased in the blade itself, and flowed by an electric current of about 45mA
ESP.TRADUIT: 其精髓在于刀体内嵌的电路脉络，通以45毫安电流，激活时可使刃口产生高频震颤效应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E9A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was a very popular product in the past two decades, when the witchhunt for Enclave survivors was in full swing, but it has fallen in... desuetude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 二十年前追猎英克雷残部时，它是黑市宠儿...如今却... 渐渐蒙尘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00012E9A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like to know more about the Hebei Shockdagger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想进一步了解下“河北”电击匕首。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You perhaps are familiar with the Gauss Rifle, an item the Brotherhood of Steel has long attempted to remove from the bounty hunting market.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许很熟悉高斯步枪了，钢铁兄弟会长期试图将其清除出赏金猎人市场的违禁品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014680_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The "traditional" Gauss design comes with a preloaded projectiles reserve, projectiles later accelerated by eleven coils, as a sort of railcannon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 传统型号采用十一级加速线圈驱动预装弹丸，实为微型磁轨炮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014680_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The drawback is however the energy cost of said coils, which will fire at the modest price of 5 Microfusion cells per shot. We deemed it inefficient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其致命缺陷在于能耗比，每发射一发都需消耗5枚微型核融合电池。这种设计在我们看来... 极其低效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014680_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our Leishen model fixes that by scrapping entirely the overly complex inbuilt projectiles reserve, thus saving space for drastic adjustments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的雷霆型号通过彻底废除过度复杂的预装弹仓，腾出空间实现革命性调整。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014680_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: At the place, we instead installed a miniaturized breeder source to power the fifteen next-generation coils we added.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们换装了微型增殖能源核心，用以驱动新增的十五组次世代加速线圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014680_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our Gauss Rifle thus doesn't require anymore special cells to accelerate its projectiles, but will need to be fed projectiles in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，我们的高斯步枪不再依赖特殊能源单元来加速弹丸，但需预先手动装填实体弹头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014680_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The scope of the original model has however been retained for... commercial purposes. Helps with the popularity of the product!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但原版瞄具设计被刻意保留... 纯属商业考量。这玩意能显著提升产品人气！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014680_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like to know more about the Leishen Gauss Rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想进一步了解下“雷神”高斯步枪 。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Longfei? Ahhh! One of our latest developed products, and one of our most expensive. Both for you, "customer", but also for our gunsmiths to make.
ESP.TRADUIT: 龙飞？哈！这可是我们最新研发的顶级货，贵到能让"顾客"你肉疼，连我们的工匠都做得手抖！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014681_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh... To sum it up, it's a super-light, semi-automatic, and low-recoil Anti-Material Rifle. Best choice to shred Power Armors or buildings alike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...总结起来就三点：超轻量化、半自动、低后坐力的反器材步枪。撕碎动力装甲或拆楼都像切黄油一样轻松。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014681_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Longfei put to shame the Gun Runners AMR, the very same that the Veteran Rangers put so much pride into. And it's not even a contest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军火贩子那帮人吹上天的游骑兵特供版？在龙飞面前根本不够看！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014681_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Add to that that it benefits from better electro-optics and a more adequate chambering in 12.7mm...
ESP.TRADUIT: 更别提我们还配了电子光学增强镜，外加量身定制的12.7mm更充足的腔室...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014681_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like to know more about the Longfei Anti-Material Rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想进一步了解下“龙飞”反器材步枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, those? Well, we currently have a surplus of those delightful vests that our guards get as uniforms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，这些啊？好吧...目前正好有批警卫制服防弹背心库存过剩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014682_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be mistaken by their looks. They are surprisingly light and comfortable for clothes capable of bouncing small bullets and energy shots alike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别看它们长这样，这些装备轻得出奇，穿着舒适度爆表，却能弹开小口径子弹和能量武器射击！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014682_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure my peers back West would really agree with me proposing them for sales... but well. Caps are Caps!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在西部的同僚们要是知道我在卖这些... 估计得气活过来。不过嘛，瓶盖就是王道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014682_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about your Shenlongi Vests?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你这些神龙马甲呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hum. Then what else do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。那你还需要些别的吗
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinal1_00014684_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I don't have anything else to enquire about the merchandise for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想关于这批货我暂时没什么可问的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You pest! Time to use the shield!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个臭虫！是时候使用护盾了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimsh_0001A221_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Sight)
ESP.TRADUIT: （叹气）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinala_0001CDEC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, apparently I don't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，显然我不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinala_0001CDEC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... don't speak... huh... weird like your men?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...的口音...嗯...不像你的手下一样奇怪吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huhuh. You were expecting me to talk like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈哈。你希望我这么说话吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinala_0001CDED_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No child of the Black Shenlong, or even the Shi had any troubles learning your tongue, and even less spelling it properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑神龙的后代，甚至始族的后代，学习你们的语言都没有任何困难，更不用说正确拼写它了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinala_0001CDED_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, our Junfas have decided that such a caricaturesque accent would only benefit our sales and make our products more... exotic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我们军阀已经决定，这种漫画式的口音只会利于我们的销售，使我们的产品更具...异国情调。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinala_0001CDED_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is near mandatory for our guards and lower representatives, but for someone of my status? I refuse to lower myself to these kind of levels...
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于我们的守卫和下级代表来说，这很必要，但对我这样身份的人来说？我拒绝降低自己的身段到这种程度...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Madam Ling [0500707B] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\MadamLingVoiceType\Stealthten_topiclingfinala_0001CDED_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The accent of your men, it's an hoax, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手下那口音…是装的吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My, my! You impress me already, my dear. Yes, I didn't bring my men out here of any place by coincidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，哇哦！你已经给我留下了深刻的印象，我亲爱的。对，我并不是随便地带我的手下来到这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimom_0002120B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We needed a base, and to quickly... recover what we came here to recover, but there were also rumours I wanted to investigate myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要一个据点，而且要尽快...回收任务目标。不过还有些传闻，我想亲自调查清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimom_0002120B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: To humour you, that place was apparently the fruit of a small RnD venture from Poseidon Energy and the US Military. Around the 2060's, I think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞笑的是，那地方显然是海神能源公司和美国军方的一个小型研发项目的成果。大概在2060年吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimom_0002120B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Omicron Facility" as they called it, meddled in particle research and possible applications in portable shield technology. Fancy stuff right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们称之为“奥密克戎设施”的地方，曾涉足粒子研究，以及便携式护盾技术的潜在应用。听起来很高端吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimom_0002120B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't go very far and got defunded. Well, that's a constant when it comes to Pre-War scientific stories, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有走多远就失去了资金支持。嗯，这在战前的科学故事中是常有的事，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimom_0002120B_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, I expected the place to have been pillaged by the Brotherhood already, and instead... Well, better not to disclose anything
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我还以为这个地方已经被兄弟会洗劫一空了，结果……我还是不告诉你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimom_0002120B_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: [That Lucky Old Sun] This is a Poseidon Energy Research Facility. You're not here fortuitously.
ESP.TRADUIT: [那个幸运的垂暮之日]这是海神能源研究设施。你可不是瞎选的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clever clever! Yes, that would be right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 聪明聪明！当然，是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimom_0002120A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: More like a corporate-owned laboratory affiliated with the US Armed Forces Pre-War, but that's beside the point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 倒更像是一个隶属于战前美国军方的企业拥有的实验室，但这不是重点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimom_0002120A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For us? Just our hideout. I'm sure you of all people can understand the value of using such a place as a temporary base of operations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我们？就是个藏身处。我相信所有人中就你最能理解把这样一个地方作为临时行动基地的价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimom_0002120A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This bunker, it was a Lab affiliated with the military, wasn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地堡，曾是一个隶属于军方的实验室，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh here? That was just our... temporary nest. A hole in the ground, more or less just a resting place so me and my men could gear up and resupply.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这里？这只不过是我们的…临时藏身处。一个地洞，基本上就是一个休息的地方，让我和手下能够整理装备和补给。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimom_00021209_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were some... ghouls investigating the place already. And some Fiends too, I think? Well, the cleanup was quite easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当时已经有几个...尸鬼在探查这个地方。好像还有几个混混？不过清理起来倒是挺轻松的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Seraphim [0500684A] (mod) Quest : ([05003C3A]Stealthtenzacraftingquest) I'm Looking Through You EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\TheSeraphimVoice\Stealthten_topicseraphimom_00021209_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, this bunker? What's its story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这个地堡？它有什么故事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Security Recording: 06/10/2077]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050010AC]steathtenzaquest) Guanyin EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Stealthtenza - Dawn.esp\VoicetypeSteathtenza\steathtenz_Pascaltape_00027D9F_1.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: [安保记录：（已损坏）/2281]

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Rumors have recently started spreading about the existence of a mysterious treasure, allegedly found by the "Scrap Divers" Prospector Gang near the shores of the Colorado's river.
For a qualified gunslinger always short on caps but never on bullets, this story could prove to be a good lead for easy money.
Dawn of Stealthtenza is recommended for seasoned Couriers (Level 18+)
ESP.TRADUIT:
最近坊间开始流传一则传闻：科罗拉多河沿岸某处埋藏着神秘宝藏，据传由"废品搜潜者"团伙所发现。
对于瓶盖袋子空空但不缺子弹又有一身本领的枪手而言，这条传闻无疑是轻松赚快钱的好机会。
《潜影曙光》模组建议资深邮差体验（推荐等级18+）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dawn of Stealthtenza
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜影曙光

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You fixing the recovered Chinese Stealth Armor (then claiming it as your own) hasn't gone unnoticed, with tales of your deed spreading like a wind across the Mojave. Your reputation increases, as do stories talking about the Courier and his new mysterious Pre-War artifact.
On the flipside, more and more people are also starting to connect the dots between the treasure of the river and your Chinese Stealth Armor, drawing the unwanted attention of shady individuals...
ESP.TRADUIT:
你将修复后的中国潜行装甲并据为己有的行为并非毫无痕迹，这段传奇如同席卷莫哈维的疾风般四处传播。你的声望持续攀升，与之相伴的是关于"邮差与他神秘的战前遗物"各种传闻在商队营地与酒馆间口耳相传。
然而另一方面，越来越多有心人开始将科罗拉多河沿岸发现的宝藏痕迹与你们的中式隐形装甲联系起来，吸引了一些可疑人士不必要的注意...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relic of the Past Repaired
ESP.TRADUIT: 修复过去的遗物

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Rumors have recently started circulating about the arrival of a mysterious preacher in the Southern Mojave, near Novac.
Witnesses talk about strange tribal markings on the man's face and torso, and the possibility of the newcomer coming from the Zion Valley, while others instead report only his annoying Mormon preachings.
In all cases, the most vocal source so far is said to have been Lady Gibson, who allegedly shouted that "a weird mutation should not make anyone a rambling priest".
It might be an interesting story to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT:
近日，莫哈维南部的诺瓦克镇周边开始流传关于神秘传道者的目击报告。
据称该男子面部与躯干布满奇特的部落图纹，有推测认为他可能来自锡安峡谷，不过也有目击者抱怨其喋喋不休的摩门教义宣讲。
目前最确凿的线索来自吉布森女士，她曾在公共场合高声斥责"肉体变异不会让人变成疯癫牧师"。这或许是一条值得追查的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Preacher
ESP.TRADUIT: 传教士

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Multiple merchants stationed near the 188 Trading Outpost have recently started complaining about mysterious attacks perpetrated near the REPCONN HQ.
While all attacks have been carried out in broad daylight, each time using plasma weaponries, the NCR is reportedly "sitting on its ass" or even "turning a blind eye because those fucking Rangers are implicated!".
The most common theories assure the perpetrators are either a group of Power Armored Enclave members, the Van Graffs, or even a gang of Mr. Gutsies hidden in the REPCONN HQ.
It might be an interesting situation to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT:
驻扎在188号贸易站周边的商队近日频频报告，太平洋引擎公司总部附近频发神秘袭击事件。
所有袭击均发生在白昼且作案工具为等离子武器，NCR驻军被指控"毫无作为"，甚至“他们装看不见，肯定因为那些该死的游骑兵牵涉其中！”。
主流推测将矛头指向三股势力：身着动力装甲的英克雷残党、臭名昭著的范·格雷夫家族，或是潜藏在太平洋引擎公司总部的巧手先生机器人军团。
这也许是一个值得调查的有趣故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: REPCONN's Boogeyman
ESP.TRADUIT: 太平洋引擎公司的鬼怪

ESP.ORIGINAL: G.U.A.N.Y.I.N enabled you to access Wangliang's Mainframe and retrieve sensible data from its internal databank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 观音能让你访问魍魉的主机从它的内部数据库中检索有用的数据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plugged to Wangliang Mainframe!
ESP.TRADUIT: 接入魍魉主机！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lack something to directly probe into Wangliang Mainframe and extract stored data.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你缺少接入魍魉主机并提取存储数据的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Prospectors from the Western Mojave have been reporting what many of them saw in the mountains separating Novac and Primm.
They bring back stories of glowing red lights near the Emergency Railway Station, loud ghastly shouts, and massive explosions tearing apart the surrounding valleys.
Most of them assure it either proves the presence of mutant will-o'-the-wisps caused by the ghosts of the Old World, or the return of the Brotherhood of Steel.
It might be an interesting story to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT:
西莫哈维探矿者近期持续上报在诺瓦克与普瑞姆之间山区的异常现象。
目击者称在应急铁路附近观测到猩红诡光，伴随撕裂山谷的剧烈爆炸与不明来源的凄厉尖啸。
主流推测分为两派：认为这是战前幽灵的变异鬼火，或是钢铁兄弟会的归来。
这或许是个值得调查的情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mountains Will-o'-the-wisps
ESP.TRADUIT: 变异鬼火

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The Quarry Junction workers have recently sent a message to the Mojave Outpost, requesting assistance in dealing with a new problem.
The message, intercepted by Powder Gangers then shared between chain-brothers, claims that a particular vicious Deathclaw hunter has taken residence in Sloan, intimidating the workers, and loudly requesting 4000 caps for each Deathclaw killed.
The message speculates that the hunter is a possible member of the infamous Chase Collegium, but many other informations contradict this claim as "the bitch doesn't even have Reinforced Combat Armor".
It might be an interesting story to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT:
采石场枢纽的工人们近日向莫哈维前哨站发出加密信道，请求协助处理新威胁。
该信息经炸药帮截获并在帮派内部流传，情报如下： 某凶残死亡爪猎人占据采石场核心区，以“清理”名义向工人勒索高额费用（每只死亡爪索价4000瓶盖）
猎人疑似与臭名昭著的“追猎团”存在关联，但疑点在于"那婊子没穿那特别的强化装甲"
这或许是个值得调查的情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Racket in Sloan
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯罗恩的喧闹

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Merchants from the Crimson Caravan Company trying to access the New Vegas Strip have recently reported that something has heavily disrupted the trade route passing through Freeside.
Apparently, something or someone is blocking one of the main gates, killing anyone trying to force its way through. Multiple deaths have been reported so far, alongside numerous wounded.
While the Van Graffs have been affected by this situation heavily, the Gun Runners seem to have remained largely unscathed by the new changes.
It might be an interesting situation to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT:
尝试进入新维加斯主城区的深红商队商人报告说，有什么东西严重破坏了通过自由区的贸易路线。
显然，有某种存在封锁了其中一扇主门，杀死了试图强行进入的人。据报道，目前已有多人死亡，多人受伤。
尽管范·格雷夫家族在此事件中损失惨重，军火贩子却似乎未受明显影响。
这或许是个值得调查的情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Freeside Blockade
ESP.TRADUIT: 被封锁的自由城

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Whoever massacred the Scrap Divers apparently returned to finish the job during your absence. The state of Lindy's corpse shows she was first badly beaten, then swiftly executed with a high-caliber shot to the head.
You are now sole depositary of the "treasure".
ESP.TRADUIT:
杀害废品搜潜者的凶手显然是趁你不在的时候回来灭口的。 林迪的尸体状况表明她先是遭到毒打，然后迅速被一枪爆头而死。
你现在是“宝藏”的唯一保管人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lindy Murdered!
ESP.TRADUIT: 林迪被谋杀了！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Reading "U.S. Covert Operations Manual" has yielded only modest results. Your basic comprehension skills enabled you to understand some of the complicated informations , but only assimilate a quarter of them.
You gain +10 Science and +5 Repair
ESP.TRADUIT:
你阅读了《美国机密行动手册》，收效甚微。你常人水平的理解能力使你能够理解一些复杂的信息，但只吸收了其中的四分之一。
你获得+10 科学 和+5 修理

ESP.ORIGINAL: Manual read! (7- Intelligence)
ESP.TRADUIT: 阅读手册！(7- 智力)

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Reading "U.S. Covert Operations Manual" has yielded dramatically good results. Your high comprehension skills and natural brilliance enabled you to understand most of the complicated informations , and assimilate all notions.
You gain +50 Science and +40 Repair
ESP.TRADUIT:
阅读《美国秘密行动手册》对你成效卓著。凭借高超的理解力与天赋异禀，你成功破译了大部分复杂情报，并将所有要领融会贯通。
你获得+50科学和+40修理

ESP.ORIGINAL: Manual read! (8+ Intelligence)
ESP.TRADUIT: 阅读手册！(8+ 智力)

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Rumors are spreading at full speed about a particularly unique event which recently happened in the New Vegas Strip.
Someone apparently slipped past the securities of the Lucky 38, entering the Casino Tower uninvited and under the nose of the Securitrons.
Most of the other Casinos have brushed out the deed as pure fiction and a ridiculous tale, but the story has still reached every corner of the Mojave, with multiple eye witnesses confirming such an extraordinary break-in.
It might be a concerning situation to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT:
新维加斯赌城区最近正疯传着一个特别的谣言。
有人未经邀请，在幸运38赌场的安保系统的眼皮子地下溜了进去。
大多数赌场都认为这是彻头彻尾的无稽之谈，但这个故事依然传遍了莫哈韦的每一个角落，和多位目击到这次离奇非法闯入的证人一起。
也许值得去调查一下？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Angel in the Tower
ESP.TRADUIT: 塔楼上的天使

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By murdering Lindy, you lost your only reliable source of information about the nature and location of the "treasure".
In all cases, either the Scrap Divers recovered the treasure and stored it on their boat, either they didn't, in which case the treasure is still hidden in the River.
If nothing is found on the boat, searching the riverbed up-North may be a good start.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你谋杀了林迪，彻底切断了关于"宝藏"实体与坐标的唯一可靠情报来源。
存在两种可能：如果废品搜潜者已成功打捞，宝物应在他们的船上；反之则仍埋藏在科罗拉多河某处。
如果在船上一无所获，向北搜索河床可能是一个好的开始。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lindy killed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 林迪被杀了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Military Operating Manual: Warcloak Armor - Model W-14G "Guanyin" ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Model W-14G "Guanyin" is our test-prototype update of the W-13H "Hei Guei", adding human activity detection sensors, computerized assistance, and a miniaturized variation of the stealth field generator of our patriotic Yangtze-class submarines (feature planned for the W-14D "Dragoon"). Designed for key operatives in high-risk environments, this suit enhances survivability and mission's success while inciting retreat only in the direst circumstances. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Introduction]
ESP.TRADUIT: [介绍]

ESP.ORIGINAL: [G.U.A.N.Y.I.N Plugged] Consult Guanyin-Proto Operating Manual?
ESP.TRADUIT: [G.U.A.N.Y.I.N 已接入] 是否查阅「观音原型机」操作手册？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes
ESP.TRADUIT: 确认

ESP.ORIGINAL: No
ESP.TRADUIT: 取消

ESP.ORIGINAL: ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- - Computerized Interface: G.U.A.N.Y.I.N. > Mission Support: Reminds officer of core mission objectives. > Threat Detection: Alerts of nearby enemies through verbal and HUD indicators. > Health Monitoring: Tracks vitals and administers alerts for critical health conditions. - Stealth Field Generator: > Activation Criteria: Automatically engages when lifesigns deemed too low to continue mission. > Duration: 4 days of stealth invisibility to facilitate escape or tactical retreat. - Polymer Armor Plating: > Light ballistic protection with improved flexibility. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ESP.TRADUIT: ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- - 计算机化交互界面（G.U.A.N.Y.I.N 核心） > 任务支持协议：提醒军官核心任务目标。 > 威胁侦测矩阵：声纹警报与HUD标识 > 生命维持监控：跟踪生命体征以启用紧急治疗的警报。 - 隐形力场发生器 激活逻辑 > 触发条件：当生命迹象太低而无法继续任务时自动启动。 > 基础续航：4天的隐身方便逃离及战术撤退。 - 聚合物装甲 > 柔韧性增强的小口径弹药防护。 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Key Features]
ESP.TRADUIT: [关键功能]

ESP.ORIGINAL: ---------------------------------------- - Donning the Armor > Engage bio-scanner by pressing activation button on the waist plate to disengage the biometric lock and open springlocks. > Step into the suit and ensure a secure fit around all major joints. > G.U.A.N.Y.I.N. will initialize and perform a system check, confirmed with vocal response - Field Operation > Health Monitoring: G.U.A.N.Y.I.N. will monitor health status changes. > Threat Alerts: Visual indicators and patriotic audio cues will appear on HUD for detected threats. - Emergency Stealth Field > Automatically activates when life signs drop below 30 percent. > Ensure to move away from threats or find cover during activation. ---------------------------------------
ESP.TRADUIT: ---------------------------------------- -穿戴流程 >启动生物扫描仪，按压腰甲激活键启动生物扫描仪，解除生物特征锁并释放弹簧锁机构。 >踏入装甲主体，确保所有主要关节与内衬缓冲层完全嵌合 >观音将启动自检协议，完成时通过语音确认 -战场感知 >健康监测：观音将实时监测健康状况的变化。 >威胁警报：视觉指示器会将显示检测到的威胁投射至HUD并播放爱国语音提示。 -紧急隐形力场 >当生命体征下降到30%以下时自动激活。 >确保在激活期间远离威胁或找到掩体。 ---------------------------------------

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Operating Instructions]
ESP.TRADUIT: [操作说明]

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a weird computerized chip. Plugging it after equipping a specific helmet might reveal additional informations
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个奇怪的计算机芯片。 在装备特定的头盔后插上它可能会显示额外的信息

ESP.ORIGINAL: ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- > Regularly inspect armor plating and G.U.A.N.Y.I.N chip for damage. > Avoid prolonged exposure to EMP sources, as they can disrupt G.U.A.N.Y.I.N.'s functionality. > Over-reliance on G.U.A.N.Y.I.N. may hinder situational awareness. Stay vigilant. > Loss or critical damage to the prototype will result in a two ranks demotion and a required reeducation session. Loss of the prototype to enemy hands will result in public execution in the case of survival. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Cautions and Warnings]
ESP.TRADUIT: [注意及警告事项]

ESP.ORIGINAL: ------------------------------------------------------------------ As of now, August 2053, the "Guanyin" Warcloak model has been approved for limited production. Completion of the "Dragoon"pattern and its updates on the miniaturized Stealth generator will however soon render the cloak restriction to critical health situations obsolete, and thus production of the "Guanyin" pattern and related equipment will be limited to 28 units. Considering planned conversions of old "Hei Guei" patterns into "Dragoon" variants, retrocompatibility is expected to be maintained for surviving Guanyin Protos, although it is the will of the Party to definitely move away from its enemy detection technology for future iterations of our Warcloak Program. ------Glory to the People's Republic!------
ESP.TRADUIT: ------------------------------------------------------------------ 截至目前，2053年8月，“观音”战衣原型已被批准限量生产。然而，“龙骑士”型号研制的完成和更新将使其健康危急情况下隐身的限制过时，因此“观音”型号相关的生产设备将限制在28台。 考虑到计划将旧的“黑鬼”型号转换为“龙骑士”变体，虽然党的意愿是未来装甲计划中不再使用侦测敌人技术，但预计现存的观音原型将保持反兼容性。 ------中华人民共和国万岁！------

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Production Notes]
ESP.TRADUIT: [生产注释]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Close Manual
ESP.TRADUIT: 关闭手动控制

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The infamous group of black marketeers known as "Black Shenlong" has apparently made moves to implant itself in the Mojave, with one of their figureheads, a certain "Madam Ling", currently working on a joint project with the NCR's Office of Science and Industry at Camp McCarran.
Considering your newfound fame as "Stealthtenza" and Black Shenlong's ties with the Shi, this could be an excellent opportunity to acquire other Pre-War high-tech Chinese devices, or even Shi-developed weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT:
臭名昭著的黑市组织“黑神龙”近期将触角伸向莫哈维废土，其核心成员“凌女士”正与NCR驻麦卡伦基地的科学与工业办公室开展联合科研项目。
鉴于您“隐身者”的名号已传遍废土，且该组织与始族的技术联系，这可能是一个获得其他战前中国高科技设备的绝佳机会，甚至是始族开发的武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Black Shenlong arrived in the Mojave!
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑神龙抵达了莫哈维！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The infamous group of black marketeers known as "Black Shenlong" has apparently made moves to implant itself in the Mojave, with one of their figureheads, your acquaintance Madam Ling, receiving a new stock of products to sell out on the Mojave markets.
Considering your newfound fame as "Stealthtenza" and Black Shenlong's ties with the Shi Enclave, this could be an excellent opportunity to acquire other Pre-War high-tech Chinese devices, or even Shi-developed weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT:
臭名昭著的黑市组织“黑神龙”近期将触角伸向莫哈维废土，其核心成员，也就是你认识的“凌女士”，收到了一批新货准备在莫哈韦沙漠的市场上销售一空。
鉴于您“隐身者”的名号已传遍废土，且该组织与始族的技术联系，这可能是一个获得其他战前中国高科技设备的绝佳机会，甚至是始族开发的武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Black Shenlong arrived in the Mojave!
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑神龙抵达了莫哈维！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your Pip-Boy uploaded a foreign radio broadcast picked up by your Stealth Armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的哔哔小子上传了一段被你的隐形装甲接收到的外国广播。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mysterious Chinese Broadcast
ESP.TRADUIT: 神秘的中文广播

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reach Level 15 first to start Dawn of Stealthtenza
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始潜影曙光任务前请先升至15级

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dawn of Stealthtenza
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜影曙光

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You read Mao Zedong's "Little Red Book", a collection of speeches and writings from the first Charmain of the People's Republic on revolution and governance, and an overall good guide to China's Pre-War Communist roots.
The book leaves little room for nuanced perspectives or criticism, but provides some insight on political strategy and leadership.
(You gained +4 Speech and spent 6 hours reading it)
ESP.TRADUIT:
你阅读了毛泽东的《毛主席语录》这部收录中华人民共和国首任主席关于革命与治国方略的著作，是理解战前中国共产主义根基的重要指南。
该书虽难容微妙立场的探讨或批判性解读，但为政治策略与领导艺术提供了独特洞见。
（你花6小时阅读，获得+4口才）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little Red Book read!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你阅读了《毛主席语录》！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You read Mao Zedong's "Ode to the Plum Blossom", a short poem using the plum blossom as a symbol of resilience, struggle, and the revolutionary spirit.
The poem is beautifully written and symbolic, but cruelly lacks depth beyond its core metaphor.
(You spent 10 minutes reading it)
ESP.TRADUIT:
你阅读了毛泽东的《卜算子·咏梅》，一首以梅花象征坚韧、斗争和革命精神的短诗。
这首诗写得非常优美且富有象征意义，但其核心隐喻之外的深度却显得有些单薄。
（你花了10分钟阅读它）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ode to the Plum Blossom read!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你读了《卜算子·咏梅》！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You read Edgar Snow抯 account and Mao抯 reflections on "The Long March", a historical account of the Chinese Red Army抯 grueling 6,000-mile retreat from Nationalist forces, an event which solidified Mao抯 leadership.
The book captures the endurance, sacrifice, and transformation of the Chinese Communist forces in their craddle, but suffer from being romanticized and propagandist.
(You gained +3 Survival and spent 8 hours reading it)
ESP.TRADUIT:
你阅读了埃德加·斯诺的报道和毛对“长征”的反思，这是一部讲述中国红军从国民党军队的围剿中战略撤退6000英里的历史记录，这一事件巩固了毛的领导地位。
这本书记录了中国共产党在摇篮中的隐忍、牺牲和蜕变，但却被浪漫和宣传化了。
（你花8小时阅读，获得+3生存）

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Long March read!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你读了《长征》！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You read Zeng Pu's "A Flower in a Sinful Sea", a tragic serial novel about love, corruption, and decadence in the late Qing Dynasty of China, portraying the fall of a scholar who succumbs to worldly pleasures.
The book offers a unique perspective on the decadence and corruption plaguing China in the late 1890's, but is overly melodramatic and remains unfinished.
(You gained +5 Barter and spent 12 hours reading it)
ESP.TRADUIT:
你阅读了曾朴的《孽海花》，这是一部讲述中国清末爱情、腐败和衰落的悲剧性连载小说，描绘了一个屈从于世俗享乐的学者的堕落。
这本书提供了一个独特的视角来看待20世纪90年代末困扰中国的颓废和腐败，但过于夸张，且没有讲完。
（你花12小时阅读，获得+5交易）

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Flower in a Sinful Sea read!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你读了《孽海花》！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You read Lu Xun's "The True Story of Ah Q", a satirical novella about a poor man, Ah Q, who constantly deceives himself into believing he has overcome his numerous misfortunes, thus exposing the flaws of Chinese society.
The novella is a brilliant satire that critiques self-delusion and political stagnation, but is frustrating to read because of Ah Q's absent character growth.
(You spent 2 hours reading it)
ESP.TRADUIT:
你阅读了鲁迅的《阿Q正传》，这是一部中篇讽刺小说，讲述了一个穷人阿Q，不断地自欺欺人，相信自己已经克服了无数的不幸，以暴露中国旧社会缺陷的故事。
这部中篇小说是一部批判精神胜利和政治停滞的杰出讽刺作品，但因为缺失阿Q的性格成长，令人读起来有些沮丧。
（你花了2个小时阅读）

ESP.ORIGINAL: The True Story of Ah Q read!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你读了《阿Q正传》！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You read Qian Zhongshu's "Fortress Besieged", a satirical novel about the struggles of a Chinese intellectual, Fang Hongjian, due to the hypocrisy and dysfunction of Chinese society in the 1930's.
The novel is a sharp social commentary on Pre-War China before the rise of the PRC, but REALLY feels like the kind of literature that would be promoted by the Communist Regime that closed the Republican era.
(You spent 4 hours reading it)
ESP.TRADUIT:
你读了钱钟书的《围城》，这是一部讽刺小说，讲述了中国知识分子方鸿渐在20世纪30年代虚伪和功能失调的中国社会中打拼的故事。
这部小说是对中华人民共和国崛起前旧中国的尖锐社评，但感觉真的像那种由共产党政权为结束共和时代推动的文学。
（你花了4个小时阅读）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fortress Besieged read!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你阅读了《围城》！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You read Qiu Xiaolong's "A Case of Two Cities", a modern detective novel set in the China of the 2000's, and featuring Inspector Chen Cao, a poetic cop investigating corruption and crime across Shanghai and the U.S.
The novel features an engaging crime mystery with deep political and social insight about Pre-War China, but suffer from heavy censorship and slow-pacing.
(You gained +1 Perception and spent 5 hours reading it)
ESP.TRADUIT:
你阅读了裘小龙的《双城记》，这是一部以21世纪的中国为背景的现代侦探小说，讲述了富有诗兴的陈超探长在上海和美国调查腐败和犯罪的故事
这部小说讲述了一个引人入胜的犯罪悬疑故事，对旧中国的政治和社会有着深刻的见解，但受到严格的审查，节奏缓慢。
（你花5小时阅读，获得+1感知 ）

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Case of Two Cities read!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你读了《双城记》！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have a gut feeling that this is not the last time you will encounter The Seraphim... even if not in the same form. But why bother, you just wasted him, right?
(An investigation of the surroundings of New Vegas Steel may held some clues)
ESP.TRADUIT:
你有一种直觉，你与"炽天使"的纠葛绝不会就此终结...即便下次相逢时他已非今日模样。 但何必多想？你不是刚把这货揍成渣了吗？
（或许在"新维加斯钢铁厂"周边调查能发现线索）

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is not over...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这还没完…

ESP.ORIGINAL: G.U.A.N.Y.I.N
ESP.TRADUIT: 观音

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite your best efforts, you can't manage to put that piece of armor on. You have no idea why, seems like something inside is blocking you from wearing it? Damn it! If only you were a bit more tech savy or skilled in Science!
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管你尽了最大的努力，但还是无法穿上这件装甲。你不知道为什么，好像里面有什么东西阻止了你穿上？该死！如果你在科学方面更精进些就好了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: This armor seems to have been sealed shut, preventing you from entering it. Upon further examination, you are able to see it is caused by some sort of internal springlock mechanism, controlled by biometric's readers placed inside the armor. Some help might be required to circumvent such an advanced biometric lock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这件装甲好像被封住了，你进不去。经过进一步的检查，你发现这是由某种内部锁机制导致的，由放置在装甲内的生物识别读取器控制。 要绕过这种先进的生物识别锁，可能需要一些帮助。
